item.title: South South Governors Meet In Rivers
item.description: Amidst the debate on zoning the 2023 Presidency to the Southern region, South-South Governors are currently meeting in Port Harcourt, the Rivers state capital. Naija News reports that the meeting is being chaired by the Chairman of the South-South Governors Forum and Governor of Delta State, Ifeanyi Okowa. The meeting is hosted by Governor Nyesom Wike and taking place at the Rivers State Government House, Port Harcourt. Though the agenda for the meeting is not yet known, issues of the Value Added Tax (VAT) and 2023 presidency are among the things that may likely be discussed.

item.title: University Workers Threaten FG With Fresh Strike Action Over N40bn Earned Allowance
item.description: A category of university workers under the aegis of the National Association of Academic Technologists (NAAT) has issued a 14-day warning to the federal government after which it will proceed on strike. The workers’ union in a statement on Saturday by its National President, Ibeji Nwokoma while speaking with journalists in Abuja said the government needs to be specific on the percentage of earned allowance that is due to the union.

item.title: Christian Plourde - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Short form video star, also known as Sevryn, who has gained fame for his self-titled TikTok channel. He has earned more than 100 million likes for his text-in-video lip syncs, POV's, memes, and sketches. Before Fame He launched his TikTok channel in October 2019. Trivia He has amassed more than 2.2 million followers on TikTok. Family Life He grew up in Boston, Massachusetts. He has a twin brother named Will who is on TikTok at willplourde.

item.title: New Super Eagles Invitee, Benjamin Tanimu Reveals His Reaction After First Call-up
item.description: New Super Eagles invitee, Benjamin Tanimu, has revealed that he couldn’t sleep on the first day he received the news that he had been invited to the senior national team. Benjamin Tanimu started his professional football career at Nigeria Premier Football League (NPFL) club, Bendel Insurance, until February 12, 2024. He helped the club gain promotion to the NPFL and also played a vital role in helping the team record a 21-game unbeaten run in the league.

item.title: Nigerians Announce Exit From NBA Virtual Meeting After Gov El-Rufai's Name Appears As Guest Speaker
item.description: Some Nigerian have taken to the social media to declare that they will boycott the forthcoming virtual conference of the Nigerian Bar Association (NBA). Naija News understands that the attendees took the decisions after discovering the inclusion of Kaduna State Governor, Nasir El-Rufai as one of the guest speaker at the virtual meeting. The citizens condemned NBA for naming Governor El-Rufai as one of its speakers, according to them the decision only shows that the association is in support of insecurity in the Southern Kaduna.

item.title: SERAP To Sue Tinubu Over Increase In Electricity Tarrif
item.description: The Socio-Economic Right and Accountability Project (SERAP) has announced that it will be suing the President Bola Tinubu-led government over a renewed plot to increase electricity tariffs. Announcing its plan in a post via its official X account on Wednesday, the right group wrote, “BREAKING: We’re suing the Tinubu administration over the reported plan to unlawfully increase electricity tariff or remove subsidy on electricity.” Naija News had last month reported that President Bola Tinubu-led government in January approved an electricity tariff hike.

item.title: Does 'The Masked Dancer' Have a Live Audience?
Gov. Adeleke's Daughter-In-Law Exposes House Help Allegedly Sleeping With Husband
item.description: Korth Heidi, the wife to Governor Adeleke’s son, Sina Rambo, has exposed the lady allegedly having a romantic affair with her husband. Naija News recalls that Korth has been in a running battle with her husband since December 2022, over several family issues including alleged domestic violence. Taking to her Instagram page Instagram, Korth shared a picture of their house help, allegedly sleeping with Sina Rambo. According to Korth, she brought the lady from Lagos, fed and paid her her N35,000 salary but she went to her back to reveal information about her to Sina at the time she wanted to quit the job.

item.title: Luis Miguel - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Iconic Mexican singer whose 1991 album Romance became one of the top-selling Spanish albums of all-time. In 1985, he became the youngest artist ever to win a Grammy at the age of 14. He's known for hits such as "Ahora te Puedes Marchar," "La Incondicional," "No Sé Tú" and "La Media Vuelta."  Before Fame He watched and analyzed the performances of Elvis Presley when he was young. At the age of 11, he formerly debuted as a singer at the wedding of the daughter of México's president at the time, José López Portillo.

item.title: Vipimo vya HIV vyaifanya harusi ya mamilioni kuvurugwa Nakuru
item.description: - Wageni waalikwa kwenye harusi waliachwa na mshangao mkubwa baada ya mchungaji kufuta mipango ya kuihalalaisha dakika ya mwisho - Jesse Karanja alitaka maharusi kuweka wazi hali yao ya afya hasa kuhusu vipimo vya HIV na licha ya kufanya hivyo alikataa katakata - Kanisa lilisema lilikuwa limewataka maharusi kuhakikisha wanapita vigezo vyote kabla ya harusi hiyo lakini hawakupita Maharusi waliokuwa wamekamilisjha mipango ya ndoa eneo la Bahati, Kaunti ya Nakuru wamekwenda mafichoni baada ya mchungaji kufuta harusi yao dakika za mwisho.

item.title: 2023: Why I Don't Want To Be Vice Presidential Aspirant
item.description: Governor Babagana Zulum of Borno State has disclosed that he does not want to be a running mate to any presidential aspirant in the 2023 general elections. The governor stated that he wants to continue to provide the dividends of democracy to the people of Borno State and complete his achievements in his second term. Zulum made this known on Thursday after emerging the 2023 governorship candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the state.

item.title: 9 of the most expensive planes flown by African presidents
item.description: Leaders around the world like to travel in ultimate style and luxury. With their busy schedule, they cannot afford to the hassles that accompany public transport. They cannot deal with waiting for flights, delays, cancellation and that is why they would spend huge amounts of money to ride in luxury. It is no surprise that most presidents have luxurious private aircraft that take them around the world. From the latest technological and aviation equipment to interior designs that are mind-blowing, you cannot help but exclaim that the insides of these private jets are more comfortable than the homes of most people.

item.title: Gervonta Davis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Southpaw who won the IBF super featherweight title in January 2017, which improved his record to 17-0 at the time. He went on to retain the title in May 2017 in a 3-round KO against #1-ranked light heavyweight Liam Walsh.   Before Fame He began training at the Upton Boxing Center in Baltimore, Maryland at age 5. In 2012, he won the National Golden Gloves championship after being a two-time National Junior Olympic gold medalist.

item.title: Teen Mom Rachel Ozuna's Murderers Identified by Spotsylvania Sheriff
Tinubu, Others Declare Support For Open Grazing Ban, Make Demands
item.description: The National Leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC) Asiwaju Bola Tinubu and other party leaders from the southwest have declared support for the ban on open grazing. The leaders declared support for the policy declaration by the southern governors on the ban of open grazing in their region. This was contained in a communique issued at the end of their meeting on Sunday held at the Marina house in Lagos.

item.title: Worries As Bandits Attack ZIPA Executive Secretary In Gusau
item.description: There was confusion on Monday after some unknown gunmen suspected of being bandits attacked the Executive Secretary of Zamfara State Investment Promotion Agency (ZIPa), Hajiya Mariam Yaro. Naija News learnt that the incident took place as she was en route to a meeting with investors, just a short distance away from Gusau, the State capital. According to the Daily Post, gunshots were fired at Yaro, resulting in various injuries. She was promptly taken to an undisclosed hospital for immediate medical attention.

item.title: 'Buhari Gave Sacked Power Minister Two Options Before Removal'
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari gave the recently sacked Minister of Power, Engineer Sale Mamman, the option of attending the federal executive council meeting or not before his removal was announced. This was made known by Sale Mamman’s Special Adviser on Media, Mr. Aaron Artimas. He disclosed that President Buhari personally informed the sacked Minister about his impending removal during a visit to the presidential villa on Tuesday. Artimas stated that his principal chose to stay away from the FEC meeting

item.title: France Nuyen - Age, Family, Bio

Trivia She studied Clinical Psychology in college, and created a second career working with abused women. Family Life She had one daughter with her first husband, Dr. Thomas Gaspar Morell. Associated With She starred alongside Vietnamese-American actress Ming Na in the film The Joy Luck Club.

item.title: Why Are Squatted Trucks Banned in Certain States? Details
item.description: Squatted Trucks, aka Carolina Squats, Are Against the Law in Several States"It's not safe; your headlights can't aim down that far, and frankly, Tom Cruise, your short a-- can't see over the hood." By Brandon CharlesMay 15 2024, Published 12:23 p.m. ET Source: Instagram/@lifted_leanin_squattedIf you're wondering what squatted trucks are, they're modified pickups or SUVs that sort of look like the truck version of a lowrider meets a monster truck. The front of the truck is elevated and the back of the truck is dropped.

item.title: Buhari Has Failed In All His Campaign Promises
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has been accused by human rights lawyer, Mike Ozekhome, of destroying Nigeria. Ozekhome noted that the All Progressives Congress-led government has failed in policies which it campaigned with in 2015. He stated this while speaking at a lecture organised by the Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria, HURIWA, with the theme: Nigerian School Children; Insecurity and Human Rights, held in Abuja. He further stated that the security challenges in the country has hindered children from going to school.

item.title: Drama As Appeal Court Sacks Araraume, Replaces Him With Ibezim
item.description: The Appeal Court sitting in Owerri, Imo State, has sacked Senator Ifeanyi Araraume as the All Progressives Congress (APC) candidate for the Imo North by-election. Naija News reports that the Imo North by-election is set to hold on Saturday, December 5, in the 64 wards across six Local Government Areas in the state. Delivering judgment on Friday, Justice Uchechukwu Onyemenam, declared Frank Ibezim as the authentic candidate of the APC ahead of the election.

item.title: Erin Moran biography: life and death of the sitcom actress
item.description: Erin Moran was an American actress, best known for playing Joanie Cunningham on the television sitcom Happy Days and its subsequent spin-off Joanie Loves Chachi. The actress succumbed to cancer on April 22, 2017, leaving behind a husband and a legacy worth remembering years later. Who was she behind the scenes, and what caused Erin Moran death? Find out all the details below. Profile summaryBirth name: Erin Marie MoranDate of birth: October 18, 1960Birthplace: Burbank, California, USADate of death: April 22, 2017Place of death: New Salisbury, Harrison County, Indiana, USA Erin Moran age at death: 56 years oldCause of death: Complications from throat cancerHeight: 5' 3"

item.title: London Elise Kress - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress and stuntwoman with stunt credits in the films Oz the Great and Powerful, Into the Storm, Grandma and Insidious: Chapter 3. Before Fame She attended Lenawee Christian School in Adrian, Michigan. Trivia She was a guest-star in an episode of Ghost Adventures called "The Oman House." Family Life She has a younger sister named Sydney. She married actor Nathan Kress in November 2015. They welcomed a daughter named Rosie in December 2017, and they welcomed a second daughter named Evie Elise Kress in March 2021.

item.title: Christen Press - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Forward who joined the U.S. women's soccer team in 2013 and was a member of the 2015 and 2019 World Cup-winning teams. She was a member of NWSL's Utah Royals FC from 2018 to 2020. In 2020, she began playing for Manchester United. Before Fame She played soccer at Chadwick School and Stanford University, both in California. Trivia She won the Hermann Trophy in 2010 and the Damallsvenskan Golden Boot Award in 2013.

item.title: Juventus Coach Hails Banned Paul Pogba
item.description: The manager of Juventus, Massimiliano Allegri, believes that Paul Pogba’s ban from football over a failed drug test is a “sad” loss to football. Allegri brought Paul Pogba back to Juventus in the summer of 2022 from Manchester United where he was struggling to get game time. Juventus decided to sign him on a free transfer due to his extraordinary performance at the club in his first stint between 2012 and 2016.

item.title: Tinubu Set To Return To Nigeria From London 'Soon'
item.description: The National Leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Tinubu is expected back in Nigeria from London soon. The disclosure was made by one of his followers and the local government chairman of Isolo in Lagos State, Adebayo Olasoju on Friday. Olasoju made the submission after he visited Tinubu in London on Friday. Naija News reports Olasoju was with Tinubu at his London abode in the company of veteran Fuji musician, Alhaji Wasiu Ayinde Marshal (K1 De Ultimate).

item.title: Woman Claims Claire's Is Ripping Kids Off With High Prices
item.description: "They Are out Here Ripping Y'all Kids off" — This Woman Says Claire's Prices Are Too High"When I was younger, Claire's was never this much," one TikToker claimed. By Callie (Carlos) CadornigaMay 22 2024, Updated 4:48 p.m. ET Source: TikTok/@erindieheartIf you found yourself into fashion as a kid and you wanted to at least give off those chic vibes, chances are you ended up at Claire's. Sure, you probably had fantasies of wearing expensive stones or the latest fashion or trying to set trends with the clothes and accessories you wore, but parents often look to Claire's as a cheap but serviceable alternative to help their kids fulfill those fantasies with jewelry fit for kids.

item.title: FG Using Huge Loans To Buy Substandard Chinese Railway Locomotives
item.description: Shehu Sani, the former Senator who represented Kaduna Central in the National Assembly has condemned the recent breakdown of the Kaduna-Abuja railway. The railway line was reported to have broken down between November 18 and November 20, exposing passengers on the journey to grave danger. After the development, Senator Sani on Thursday, November 26 took to his Twitter account to lament the huge loans the federal government of Nigeria took to put the railway in place and for it to be breaking down at such an early stage.

item.title: Agitating For Yoruba Nation Not A Crime, Release Sunday Igboho
item.description: Renowned novelists, Professor Wole Soyinka, has called on Benin Republic authorities to immediately release Yoruba nation agitator, Sunday ‘Igboho’ Adeyemo. Naija News recalls that the Department of State Services, DSS, had on July 1, 2021, attacked the Ibadan home of the Sunday Igboho, killing two people and arresting 12 others. The Yoruba activist who escaped the attack by the security agency went into hiding but later resurfaced in Cotonou, Benin Republic.

2023 Presidency: Buhari Will Support Tinubu Against Osinbajo, Fayemi
item.description: A close confidant of President Muhammadu Buhari and chieftain of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Senator Abu Ibrahim has declared that Asiwaju Bola Tinubu will get Buhari’s support for his 2023 presidential ambition. Ibrahim said the northern region and particularly, northwest politicians will be at loss in the future if Buhari refuses to support Tinubu’s 2023 presidential ambition. According to him, Asiwaju Tinubu mobilized southwest votes for Buhari in 2015 and it’s simply payback time.

item.title: Why I Will Marry A Man Like Sylvester Madu, Who Is Selling Okirika
item.description: Nollywood actress, Didi Ekanem, has expressed interest in marrying a man like her colleague, Sylvester Madu, who went viral online for selling second-hand clothes popularly known as Okirika. The actor while reacting after a video of him made rounds online, took to the video-making app, Tiktok to proudly show off his ‘business empire’ with multiple people selling various kinds of second hand goods.

item.title: 'Bring Back Our Worldly Davido'- Reactions As Davido Turns 'Gospel Singer'

Davido In the single titled ‘Thankful’, detoured from his main Afropop terrain, delving into a character, delivering a piercing first verse and hook, enriched with praise poetry in his mother tongue. The song’s general theme encourages approaching God with an attitude of Gratitude, which unusually genre for an artist like Davido.

item.description: Lead vocalist of the metalcore band Emmure who has performed on each of the band's 6 LPs they released between 2007 and 2014. Before Fame He met Emmure original members Joe and Ben Lionetti through an internet message board and traveled to Connecticut to rehearse with them. Trivia He is a fan of Street Fighter and Marvel Comics which is shown in several of the band's song lyrics. Family Life He is from Queens, New York.

item.title: Hassan Jameel - Age, Family, Bio
Retro: Let's talk about Prophet Daniel Abodunrin who was devoured by lions after he entered their ca
item.description: In the year 1991, a certain man named Prophet Daniel Abodunrin took a step that left his name on the lips of every Nigerian as he is still remembered till date. On that fateful day many years ago, business was going fine at the University of Ibadan zoological garden which is located at the school premises when Prophet Daniel showed up to put the word of God to test. Prophet Abodurin’s intention was to recreate the biblical story of a young man named Daniel who out of envy was thrown into the lions’ cage without getting mauled.

item.title: 2023 Presidency: APC, PDP Have Lost Their Political Relevance
item.description: The Presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP), Peter Obi, says the two major political parties in the country have lost their political relevance. Obi claimed that both the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) and the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) cannot win the 2023 general elections because Nigerians have deserted both parties. He said the Labour Party would defeat both parties in the upcoming presidential election due to the support from Nigerian workers, youths, and market women.

item.title: Cindy Williams - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American actress who starred as Shirley Feeney on the series Laverne and Shirley from 1976 to 1983. She also portrayed Laurie Henderson in the hit 1973 coming of age film American Graffiti. Before Fame She debuted as an actress through a variety of commercials for Foster Grant sunglasses. She made her big screen debut in the 1970 Roger Corman film Gas-s-s-s. Trivia She co-produced the 1990s Steve Martin comedies Father of the Bride and Father of the Bride Part II.

item.title: IGP, ICPC Asked To Invite, Investigate And Prosecute Senator Bulkachuwa
item.description: The Nigerian Bar Association (NBA) has called on the Inspector-General of Police, IGP Usman Alkali Baba, and the Chairman of the Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission (ICPC) to immediately invite, investigate and probe former Senator Adamu Bulkachuwa. Naija News recalls that Bulkachuwa had revealed he often influenced the decisions of his wife, a former President of the Court of Appeal, Zainab Bulkachuwa, while she was in office.

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu: Why IPOB Should Lockdown South East For Two Weeks
item.description: Popular Nigerian activist, Deji Adeyanju, says the only way Nnamdi Kanu can be quickly released is the total compliance of the sit-at-home order by the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB). Naija News reports that Kanu is facing an amended seven-count charge of terrorism and treasonable felony preferred against him by the Federal Government. The IPOB leader has made three court appearances since June after security operatives brought him back from Kenya.

item.title: Ashley Snell - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model and entrepreneur most widely recognized for being the wife of professional basketball player Tony Snell, who has played for teams in the National Basketball League including the Chicago Bulls, the Detroit Pistons, the Portland Trail Blazers, and the New Orleans Pelicans. She is the owner and founder of her clothing line, the Ashley Snell Collection, which features coastal cool loungewear available to women of all shapes and sizes, and offers selections from XXS to 4XL.

item.title: PHOTOS From NYSC Swearing-In Across Nigeria Today
item.description: Members of the National Youth Service Corp (NYSC) Batch 'B' were today, Friday, October 30, sworn-in at different centres across the federation. From Kubwa in Nigeria's federal capital, to Bauchi, where the dreaded Islamist sect, Boko Haram have posed constant trouble, and Anambra, the newly sworn-in corp members looked lively and very happy with the exercise which took place at various orientation camps. In Nigeria, the orientation and swearing in ceremony of the youth corp members for a mandatory one year national service after graduation, often elicits excitement and this year's celebration was no exception.

item.title: Tamra Judge Is Officially Returning to 'RHOC' Two Years After She Was Fired
item.description: Tamra Judge is officially returning to 'RHOC' more than two years after she was first fired from the Bravo reality series. Details. Real Housewives franchise during Season 3 back in 2007, and, over the years, she let viewers in on her divorce from Simon Barney, her financial issues during the Recession, her remarriage to Eddie Judge, and her epic feuds with the likes of Gretchen Rossi, Kelly Dodd, and Alexis Bellino.

item.title: Does Jane Die on 'Blindspot'? The Show's Creator Hints at an Endgame

The series has yet to be picked up for a fifth season and there are only so many times the former Navy SEAL can escape death, right?

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu Trial Continues At The Federal High Court Abuja
item.description: The leader of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Mazi Nnamdi Kanu, will today continue is trial before Justice Binta Nyako of the Federal High Court in Abuja. The office of the Attorney-General of the Federation and Minister of Justice has on behalf of the federal government, filed a seven-count amended charge against Nnamdi Kanu. The charges border on treasonable felony and acts of terrorism. Recall that the Biafra leader was reportedly rearrested in Kenya and extradited back to Nigeria on the 27th of June, 2021.

item.title: A dog owner gave a photoshoot to their pregnant dog
item.description: This dog just got the cutest maternity shoot ever and it's going viral for how accurate it is. Maternity shoots are all the rage these days.  There have been so many envoking all different emotions.  There are ones that make you cry from the cuteness, others that make you laugh from the silliness, and even some get crazy like being under water.  But none of them can compare to when you get a loveable dog and their owner together and put together the maternity shoot for the ages.

item.title: FG Reveals Identity Of Terrorist Group Behind Ondo Catholic Church Attack
item.description: The Federal Government has revealed the identity of the terrorist group behind the attack on St. Francis Catholic Church in Owo, Ondo State. The Minister of Interior, Rauf Aregbesola on Thursday linked fighters of the Islamic State of West Africa Province (ISWAP) to the attack which took place on Sunday. Aregbesola revealed this while addressing State House correspondents after a meeting of the National Security Council presided over by President Muhammadu Buhari.

item.title: Peter Obi Meets Bishop Oyedepo (Photo)
item.description: The former Governor of Anambra State and presidential candidate on the platform of the Labour Party, Peter Obi, has paid a visit to the founder of the Living Faith Church Worldwide, Bishop David Oyedepo at the Canaanland headquarters of the church in Ota, Ogun state. According to Church Gist, the former governor of Anambra visited the cleric on Tuesday, 19th of July, which happens to be his birthday. One of the church’s pastors (Leke Beecroft) in Canaanland, shared a photo of the Labour party presidential candidate and cleric pictured together on his Facebook page on Wednesday.

item.title: Coalition Of Northern Groups React To Obasanjo's Open Letter To Buhari
item.description: Following the open letter released by former President Olusegun Obasanjo, the Coalition of Northern Groups has stated that the only way to solve the problems in Nigeria is through a peaceful referendum. Recall that ex-President Obasanjo had written an open letter to Muhammadu Buhari on the security lapses that threaten the very existence of the country and the seeming non-existence of government or apparent loss of control by the President.

item.title: Boko Haram Fighters Burn UN Facilities In Borno, Attack Workers
item.description: Boko Haram terrorists on Saturday attacked Damasak town in Borno State and burnt United Nations facilities, forcing humanitarian workers to run for their lives. According to SaharaReporters, the terrorists who had the support of the Islamic State West African Province fighters set fire to the UN office and to at least three other international charity organisations contiguous to the UN facility. A source that narrated the incident said, “The terrorists came into the town in gun trucks.

item.title: What Is the 16 Dollar McDonald's Meal? Why It's Gone Viral
item.description: A McDonald's meal that cost 16 dollars has gone viral on TikTok, and it's causing political headaches over the persistence of inflation. The Gist: A video of a $16 McDonald's meal has continued to go viral for almost a year since it was first released. The video is popular in right-wing circles as an indication of high inflation and a bad overall economy. It resonates with many Americans, who feel that the economy is currently headed in the wrong direction.

item.description: Does Addison die in 'Grey's Anatomy'? Season 19 of 'Grey's Anatomy' is losing characters left and right. Here's what happened in the two-part ending. Source: ABCSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Season 19 of Grey's Anatomy. So far, we've soldiered through a handful of Grey's Anatomy episodes without Ellen Pompeo, and it feels like we'll have to live through some growing pains. It's vaguely reminiscent of Sandra Oh's departure in Season 10, followed almost immediately by the death of Derek Shepherd (Patrick Dempsey) in Season 11.

item.title: MP Millie Odhiambo taunts Senator Cherargei, says she won't vote for William Ruto
item.description: - The Suba North MP lashed out at Senator Cherargei over hate remarks - The legislator made it public she will not be coerced into supporting DP Ruto's presidency come what may - The Nandi senator was accused of making remarks perceived to be tantamount to hate speech - He was arrested by DCI detectives and later released after recording a statement Suba North MP Millie Odhiambo has made it public she will not board Deputy President William Ruto's 2022 political vehicle despite several intimidation and threats from his confidants.

item.title: Presidential Tribunal Affirms Tinubu As President
item.description: The presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the February 25, 2023 presidential election, Bola Tinubu has been declared as the rightful winner of the electoral process. Naija News understands that the Presidential Election Petitions Court on Wednesday gave the verdict. Tribunal, while ruling on whether the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) was right to return Tinubu as the duly elected by a majority of lawful votes cast, held that the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar did not successfully prove his petition seeking to remove Tinubu from office.

item.title: Is Tana Mongeau Bi? What We Know About the YouTube Star's Preferences
item.description: Is Tana Mongeau bisexual? The YouTube star, who split with Jake Paul earlier this year, doesn't like using labels to describe her sexuality. Anyone who regularly follows popular internet personality Tana Mongeau is well-aware that she's dated a wide range of celebs, from former Disney actress Bella Thorne to YouTube sensation Jake Paul. And although her sexual preferences are nobody's business but her own, many have wondered if she considers herself to be bisexual.

item.title: It Is Unfortunate - Shehu Sani Tackles Ado-Doguwa Over Threat To Deal With Those Who Won't Vote APC
item.description: Former Kaduna Central lawmaker, Shehu Sani has reacted to the statement of Kano lawmaker, Alhassan Ado-Doguwa to deal with those who don’t vote for the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the forthcoming election. Taking to his Twitter account on Tuesday, the former lawmaker said the threat by Ado-Doguwa who is the Majority Leader of the House of Representatives is a serious threat to the 2023 elections. Naija News earlier reported that Doguwa was caught on camera threatening to deal with those who won’t vote for the All Progressives Congress (APC).

item.title: Types of cultism in Nigeria, groups, history, symbols and meanings
item.description: There are several types of cultism in Nigeria. Their symbols represent what they stand for. At times, members willingly or forcefully tattoo these symbols on themselves. Cultism is popular among today's youths who seek easy and quick money and riches. TABLE OF CONTENTSThe world is aware of cultism in Nigeria because social media users and the mainstream media associate several viral murder cases and massacres with cults thriving in universities and secondary schools.

item.title: Bill Cosby Denied Parole: Actor Remains Hopeful Court Will Vacate His Conviction
item.description: - Bill Cosby has been denied parole but remains hopeful the Pennsylvania State Supreme Court will issue an opinion to vacate his conviction - The US comedian failed to participate in a treatment programme for sex offenders, according to the Pennsylvania Parole Board - The actor was not surprised by the decision because members of the board told him he wouldn't get it because he didn't take part in the treatment programme for sex offenders

item.title: Colin Farrell - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Irish actor who starred in Phone Booth in 2002 and won a Golden Globe Award for his role in In Bruges. His other film credits include Horrible Bosses, Crazy Heart, Miami Vice, The Recruit,The Lobster and Minority Report. Before Fame He unsuccessfully auditioned for the Irish boy band Boyzone. The film E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial inspired him to start acting. Trivia He appeared opposite Ben Affleck in the superhero movie Daredevil in 2003. In 2015, he played a lead role in the second season of HBO's True Detective.

item.description: What happened to John Combe from 'Home Town'? Fans of the HGTV series were surprised by the message displayed at the end of his episode. During each episode of Home Town, viewers are introduced to a new client looking to turn a property into their dream home. Married couple Ben and Erin Napier work together to make these visions a reality on the HGTV series — and along the way, fans meet some pretty interesting characters.

item.title: What Tinubu's Swearing-in Will Do To Me
item.description: The Labour Party (LP) presidential candidate, Peter Obi has declared that the inauguration of Bola Tinubu as the President of Nigeria would strengthen him. He made the submission on Sunday while speaking during a Twitter spaces session. Naija News recalls Tinubu defeated Obi and other candidates at the February 25 presidential elections in Nigeria but the Labour Party candidate disagreed with the election results as declared by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) and has vowed to reclaim his ‘stolen mandate’ at the tribunal.

item.title: Afenifere Speaks On Endorsing Tinubu For President
item.description: Top Yoruba socio-cultural and political group, Afenifere has denied endorsing the 2023 presidential ambition of the National Leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Tinubu. The group added that apart from Tinubu, it has also not endorsed any aspirant for the 2023 presidential race. Afenifere Director of Communications, Sola Lawal made the stand of the group known in a statement on Wednesday titled ‘Afenifere denies endorsing presidential aspirant.’

item.title: Darren McFadden - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: All-American running back at Arkansas who was selected 4th overall by the Oakland Raiders in 2008. He struggled to stay healthy early in his NFL career but managed to rush for 1,157 yards in 2010, his third season. After seven years in Oakland, he signed with the Dallas Cowboys in 2015. Before Fame He was an Arkansas standout starting in his first year, when he set the record for most rushing yards by a freshman.

item.title: Ondo Govt Postpones School Resumption, Cancels Cross Over Service
item.description: Governor Rotimi Akeredolu-led government has cancelled Cross Over services in Ondo State and postponed the resumption of primary and secondary schools to Monday, 18th January 2021. The development was disclosed by the Chairman of the Ondo State Interministerial Committee on Coronavirus and the Vice-Chancellor, University of Medical Sciences, Ondo, Prof. Adesegun Fatusi, during a press conference on Wednesday. Prof. Fatusi in his statement warned that no church service organised in respect of the new year celebration must exceed 10 pm until further notice.

item.title: What Are Bunny Teeth? TikTok Can't Decide If They Like Them
item.description: Sometimes viewed as a cosmetic imperfection, bunny teeth have been getting some love on TikTok. What are bunny teeth, exactly? Details inside. Everyone wants a perfect smile, right? It's the reason why cosmetic dentistry exists and the reason why I am wearing a retainer right now. While there is no concrete definition of the perfect smile, I envision it as looking like the smiles of the people who star in toothpaste commercials — white, sparkly, smiles made up of straight teeth that are perfectly aligned.

item.title: Nigeria Ranks 10th In Africa's Most Unsafe Countries For Women (Full List)
item.description: The global Women’s Peace and Security Index 2023 has ranked Nigeria as the 10th most unsafe country for women in Africa. The Central African Republic tops the list, with DR Congo and South Sudan following closely in second and third place, respectively. In contrast, Africa’s smallest country, Seychelles, stands as the top-ranked safest nation for women, with Cape Verde and South Africa following in the rankings. The 2023 WPS Index evaluates and ranks 177 countries based on women’s inclusion, justice, and security.

item.title: PDP Leaders In Closed Door Meeting Over Committee Report
item.description: Some leaders of the Peoples Democratic Party are currently in a closed-door meeting at the headquarters of the party in Abuja. The party leaders are meeting to come up with an acceptable running mate for the presidential candidate of the main opposition party, Atiku Abubakar. Naija News had earlier reported that a committee led by former National Security Adviser, Aliyu Gusau suggested some names for the party to pick. The names submitted to the party include governors, Nyesom Wike (Rivers), Ifeanyi Okowa (Delta) and Udom Emmanuel (Akwa Ibom).

Singles will learn a dance routine and will perform it on their first date with a complete stranger. Move over, Tinder. There is a new way to find love.

item.title: Wike's Proposal To Atiku For Unity In PDP Revealed
item.description: The move by some stakeholders of the Peoples Democratic Party to substitute the Delta State Governor, Ifeanyi Okowa for Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State as the party’s vice-presidential candidate has been rejected by Atiku Abubakar. The stakeholders in the main opposition party had taken the step as a means of restoring unity in the party. Governor Wike and his loyalists seem not in support of the presidential ambition of Atiku ahead of the 2023 general elections.

item.title: Court Grants Okorochas Aides N70m Bail As Ex-Imo Governor's Loyalist Slumps
item.description: A Magistrate Court in Owerri, Imo State on Monday granted 14 aides of the former governor of the state, Senator Rochas Okrocha, N5 million each totaling N70 million. This was after a mild drama played out inside the court, as one of the 14 suspects, Darlington Ibekwe, slumped. Ibekwe and 13 other loyalists of Senator Okorocha were arraigned for breaking into the sealed Royal Spring Palm Hotel and Apartments owned by Okorocha’s wife

Recall that all the housemates were put up for possible eviction after Amaka was suddenly evicted on Monday. During the Sunday live show today, Giddyfia and Diana were evicted alongside the fake housemate, Deji.

item.title: Wakenya wamekopa KSh430.5 bilioni tangu kuzinduliwa kwa M-Shwari
item.description: - M-Shwari ilizinduliwa miaka saba iliyopita kupitia ushirikiano wa kampuni ya Safaricom na NCBA - Zaidi ya wateja 450,000 wamewekeza pesa zao katika huduma hiyo - Vijana ndio wanakopa zaidi katika huduma hiyo ya mkopo kupitia njia ya simu - Kufikia sasa kima cha KSh18.7 bilioni ndizo zimehifadiwa M-Shwari imeandikisha rekodi ya KSh430.5 bilioni za mkopo kwa Wakenya, miaka saba baada ya mfumo wa kukopa kupitia njia ya simu ya mkononi kuzinduliwa kwenye soko ya Kenya.

item.title: Cardi B's Husband Calls Her Out For Lying On Her "WAP" Verse
item.description: The Husband to Popular American rapper Cardi B has been exposed after lying on WAP verse. Cardi B, in her “WAP” verse video claimed she doesn’t sweep, cook, or do anything but her husband has exposed her lies with his recent video. In the video, Cardi B was seen sweeping the room after they had opened some presents tidying up the place and Offset captioned the video ‘liar’. Therefore he’s practically trying to tell us that all his wife’s claims of not sweeping and doing house chores were all lie with the video as evidence.

item.title: Huge Crowd As President Tinubu Attends Jumaat Service In Lagos (Video)
item.description: President Bola Tinubu on Friday attended the Jumaat service at the Lagos Central Mosque, Nnamdi Azikiwe Street, Lagos Island. A video of the President’s arrival at the mosque showed a large number of residents who trooped out and lined the streets to catch a glimpse of the President. Security operatives were fully on ground and alert to keep the surging crowd at bay as Tinubu made his entrance into the mosque.

item.title: Henry Winkler - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Skyrocketed to fame as the greaser mechanic The Fonz on Happy Days during the 1970s. He has since starred as Sy Mittleman on Children's Hospital, Barry Zuckerkorn on Arrested Development, Mr. Rock on Hank Zipzer and multiple other roles in film and television.  Before Fame He made his acting debut in his 8th grade school production of Billy Budd, after which he earned his bachelor's degree from Emerson College in 1967 and graduated from Yale School of Drama in 1970.

item.title: The 5 Best Christmas Episodes to Watch With Your Kids
item.description: There's plenty of Christmas-themed episodes of shows out there to watch with your kids, but here are a few of the very best ones. Source: nickelodeonIt's hard to find a show that hasn't had a Christmas episode. But, it's also pretty hard to find a show that has a Christmas episode that both kids and parents can enjoy watching. Most parents aren't eager to sit through a lot of kids programming, and some kids just aren't ready to sit through all of the Friends' Christmas episodes.

item.title: Tinubu Seeks Senate's Approval For $800 Million World Bank Loan
item.description: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu has submitted a request to the Senate on Thursday for an $800 million loan approval. Naija News recalls that former President Muhammadu Buhari had sent the same request to the 9th Senate in May, but the assembly was unable to review the request before its term ended on June 11. In a letter read by Senate President Godswill Akpabio during Thursday’s plenary session, President Tinubu asked the 10th Senate to give the green light for the loan.

item.title: Atiku Campaign Council Gives Update On Calls For Ayus Resignation
item.description: The Atiku Abubakar Campaign Council has said the demands for the resignation of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) National Chairman, Iyorchia Ayu, have already been addressed. According to the council spokesman, Charles Aniagwu, the National Executive Committee had already passed a vote of confidence on Ayu, thereby addressing the issue. Recall that Governor Seyi Makinde of Oyo State on Wednesday called for Ayu’s resignation, and demanded the chairmanship position should be occupied by someone from the South.

item.title: FG Fixes New Date For DisCos To Increase Electricity Tariff
item.description: The Federal Government has asked Nigeria’s 11 Electricity Distribution Companies (DisCos) to increase tariff from the 1st of September 2021. The directive was given in a letter by the Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) titled “Tariff Increase Notification.” According to the document titled:”023/EKEDP/GMCLR/0025/2021, dated 25th August 2021, and seen by The Nation, NERC gave DisCos the leverage to charge a service-based tariff. It was gathered that the Eko Electricity Distribution Company (EKEDC), has already officially informed its customers on the decision of upward tariff adjustment effective from 1st September 2021.

item.title: Finally, Buhari Returns To Daura After Eleven Months
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Friday jetted out of Abuja for his hometown, Daura in Katsina State, to begin a seven-day private visit. Naija News reports that this is President Buhari’s first visit since December 2019 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The president’s ‘private visit’ was made known in a statement by Senior Special Assistant on Media and Publicity, Garba Shehu, titled “President Buhari in Daura on week-long private visit.” According to the statement, Buhari will participate in the weekly Federal Executive Council (FEC) meeting virtually from his hometown.

item.title: Robyn Dixon - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Cast member of The Real Housewives of Potomac who has also worked as a publicist and event manager in Washington DC. Before Fame She was a star college basketball player at the University of Maryland, where she obtained a degree in business marketing. Trivia She filed for bankruptcy in 2013. Her ex-husband's aunt is Sheila Dixon, the first female mayor of Baltimore. Family Life She is the mother of two children named Corey and Carter.

item.title: US lists Kenya among global abduction hotspots
item.description: Kenya's tourism sector could suffer a major setback following a decision by the United States of America (USA) to list the country as one of the global kidnapping hotspots. The new travel advisory came with introduction of kidnapping risk indicator to the safety and security messaging for US travellers which may discourage American citizens from visiting the country for tourism. READ ALSO: President Donald Trump demands Uganda finds kidnappers of US tourist

item.title: BREAKING: Buhari sacks Obazee as executive secretary of FRC, announces replacement
item.description: The executive secretary of the Financial Reporting Council of Nigeria, Jim Obazee, has been sacked by President Muhammadu Buhari. The president also ordered the reconstitution of the council. Adedotun Sulaiman has been appointed as chairman and Daniel Asapokhai as the new executive secretary for the council. This was disclosed in a statement by Garba Shehu, the senior special assistant to the president on media and publicity. Sulaiman was a former managing partner/director of Arthur Anderson and later, Accenture.

item.title: Chris Sacca - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Founded Lowercase Capital, a Venture Capital firm which has made investments in several successful technology companies including Uber, Instagram, and Twitter. In 2015 it was announced that he would be a guest shark on ABC's Shark Tank. Before Fame He got a law degree from Georgetown University, and later held an influential position at Google. Trivia In 2015 Forbes magazine declared him to a billionaire. He has over 1.5 million followers on Twitter.

item.title: Dismiss Appeal To Swear-In Atiku As President, Buhari Tells Court
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has asked the Court of Appeal in Abuja to throw out an appeal seeking to nullify his election. The Nigerian leader also asked the appellate court to dismiss the appeal to swear in former vice president Abubakar Atiku as President. Naija News reporrs that the Nigerian leader was reacting to an appeal filed by the Incorporated Trustees of the Civil Society Observatory for Constitutional and Legal Compliance (CSOCLC) before the appellate court.

item.title: Medical doctor jumps into Lagos lagoon, kills self
item.description: A man who is believed to be a medical doctor has reportedly taken his own life by jumping into the Lagos lagoon at the Third Mainland Bridge. Reports indicate that the incident occurred on Sunday, March 19, 2017. The report said the alleged medical doctor was driven to the spot in his Nissan SUV. He stopped the driver with the excuse that he wanted to check something on the body of the car.

item.description: Actress, singer, dancer and model who was awarded the 2012 Murex d'Or in celebration of her contributions to Lebanese art. Before Fame She began to pursue her professional artistic endeavors in 2007. Trivia She competed on the 3rd season of Dancing with the Stars. Family Life She has a much younger sister named Christel. She also has a sister named Sandy. Associated With Darren Bennett was one of the judges on Dancing with the Stars when she competed.

item.title: Drama as Company Announces Vacancy for Position 35 Minutes after Worker Died, People React
item.description: - A woman shared a touching story of how her colleague's position at work was declared open minutes after the person's death - The tweep with the handle @ChinklydChelz advised people always to take care of themselves, suggesting that anybody was dispensable in every organisation - Many people supported her view as they also shared instances where people were quickly replaced after their demise A woman with the Twitter handle @ChinklydChelz has taken to the platform to emphasise the need always to take one's welfare important.

item.title: DSS Bars Journalists From Covering Nnamdi Kanus Trial
item.description: Reporters, lawyers and other observers have been barred from covering the trial of detained leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB, Nnamdi Kanu, at the Federal High Court in Abuja. Naija News gathered that journalists who had arrived at the court premises as early as 6am, were denied access to the courtroom by operatives of the Department of State Services, DSS It was learned that reporters from print and broadcast stations were turned back by hooded DSS officers and other security agents who barricaded all routes leading to the court.

item.title: Jennifer Griffiths - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Became known as the mother behind the YouTube-famous family The Griffiths, who created the family-run channel A Griffiths Life Vlogs, which has earned over 60,000 subscribers, as well as 8 Passengers, which has amassed over 380,000 subscribers. Before Fame Her eldest daughter Ruby, originally created the YouTube channel 8 Passengers in 2015. Trivia All five of her children have their own highly successful YouTube channels. Family Life She married Chad Griffiths. They are parents to five YouTubers Ruby, Julie, Ellie, Bonnie, and Beau.

item.title: Ralf Rangnick Appointed As Manchester United Interim Manager
item.description: English Premier League club, Manchester United has confirmed the appointment of Ralf Rangnick as its interim manager until the end of the season. The club confirmed the fresh appointment in a statement on Monday released on its official website. Naija News reports that Ralf and the club have also agreed that he will continue in a consultancy role for a further two years. Speaking about the appointment, Manchester United football director John Murtough, said everyone at the club is excited to welcome the new manager.

item.title: We Are Ready To Eat Fish
item.description: Aareonakakanfo of Yorubaland, Gani Adams, has stated that the Southwest is ready to find new ways to balance meals if the cost of a cow goes as high as N2 million due to anti-open grazing laws. Recall that Miyetti Allah Cattle Breeders Association (MACBAN), during a public hearing on the recently passed and signed Anti-open grazing law in Lagos, had claimed that cows would sell for as high as N2 million if the bill is passed.

item.title: What Does Janelle Brown Do for a Living? The 'Sister Wives' Star Is on Her Own
item.description: What does Janelle Brown do for a living? The 'Sister Wives' star has dabbled in many different jobs through the years. What does she do for work now? Source: TLCThose who have been watching Sister Wives since the beginning have seen the Brown family embark on a number of business ventures through the years. From clothing and jewelry, to writing a book, to opening a bed and breakfast, their sources of income are wide and varied.

What We Know About the New SeasonBy Sara BelcherUpdated May 13 2020, 4:44 p.m. ET Source: FOXSeason 3 of Fox's hit reality singing competition The Masked Singer is about to end, much to the disappointment of some fans. The show has seemingly swept away fans, keeping them busy while quarantined. So it wasn't a surprise when Fox announced there would be a new season — though their planned fall debut took some by surprise.

item.description: - Odion Ighalo was among the scorers for Al-Shabab in their win over Al-Nassr - The goal scored by the Nigerian was his first for the Saudi Arabian side after 2 games - Ighalo was at Premier League side Manchester United before he joined Al-Shabab PAY ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Follow TUKO.co.ke on Twitter! Nigerian striker Odion Ighalo has finally scored his first goal for his new Saudi Arabian side in their emphatic League win over countryman Ahmed Musa's former club Al-Nassr.

item.title: University of Embu - courses offered and fees payable
item.description: The University of Embu (UoEm) is a constituent college of the University of Nairobi established in 2011. It is an institution of higher learning and the epicentre of excellence in research and training. Over the years, the university has focused on innovation as the engine of its institutional development. As a public university, UoEm continues to facilitate and encourage novelty in technologies and ideas in its endeavours. The University of Embu commits to providing high-quality education, training, research, and extension services.

item.title: Aging Like Fine Wine: 5 Latest Photos of Beautiful Catherine Kasavuli
item.description: On Monday, KBC Channel 1 unveiled its revamped news team consisting of big-name journalists The veteran journalists were Catherine Kasavuli, Tom Mboya, Cynthia Nyamai, Badi Mukhsin, Fred Indimuli, John Kioria, Fayyaz Qureishi, Juma Ballo, Harith Salim, Nancy Onyancha and Shiksha AroraKasavuli will be hosting a new show dubbed 'Legend Edition' every Saturday on KBC Channel 1Kenyans on social media couldn't hide their excitement after Kasavuli's return and took to social media to warmly welcome her back to the screensVeteran media personality Catherine Kasavuli is a darling to many, and her return to the screens has sent fans into jubilation.

item.title: Andy Hurley - Age, Family, Bio
Independence Day: Nigeria's Federalism Built On Falsehood
item.description: The Aare Onakakanfo of Yoruba land, Gani Adams has advocated that Nigeria be restructured along regional lines. Speaking against the backdrop of the country’s 61st independence anniversary celebration, the Yoruba generalissimo said each region should be allowed to operate and develop at its own pace instead of concentrating all power and resources at the centre. In his view, this will allow the abundant natural resources in the regions to be exploited and developed, leading to the ‘magic’ of more money.

item.title: Senator Victor Umeh Dumps APGA, Joins Peter Obi In Labour Party
item.description: A former national chairman of All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) Senator Victor Umeh has dumped the party for the Labour Party (LP). Recall that APGA had denied Umeh its ticket to contest for the Anambra Central senatorial district seat for the 2023 general elections. According to Vanguard, there is ongoing primary of LP in Awka where Umeh is expected to be nominated as the candidate of the party for Anambra Central.

item.title: Video Allegedly Shows Mom of 14-Year-Old Confronting TikTok Star Ondreaz Lopez
item.description: What happened with Ondreaz Lopez? A video allegedly shows the TikTok star talking with a 14-year-old’s mother about his interactions with the teen. Source: InstagramTwitter users are expressing shock and dismay over brothers and TikTok stars Tony and Ondreaz Lopez, especially because some thought the latter was the “not problematic brother.” So, what happened with Ondreaz Lopez? Trigger warning: This article covers allegations of sexual assault. Ondreaz is facing a new scandal involving his alleged interactions with an underage girl, just weeks after a lawsuit accused Tony of committing sexual battery and soliciting explicit photos from underage girls in a lawsuit, as People reported.

item.title: Ashley Serrano - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Social media star and model who rose to prominence on her ashleymariaserrano Instagram account, where she has posted snapshots from her travels and pictures of her outfits. She often makes dance and POV videos. She has accumulated more than 600,000 followers on the platform due to her spicy photos. Before Fame She made her first Instagram post in July 2020. Trivia She posted an Instagram reel in February 2023 in collaboration with Joe Alvarez of The Black Tape Project, a pioneer in the body art tape field.

item.title: Establish Ministry Of Nomadic Affairs To End Fulani-Herders' Crisis
item.description: The Federal Government has been asked to establish the Federal Ministry of Nomadic Affairs in the country as a step toward ending the Fulani-herders crisis in Nigeria. Naija News reports that the Miyetti Allah Kautal Hore Fulani Association made the call on Monday at the end of its expanded National Executive meeting with state chairmen of the association held in Abuja According to them, establishing the ministry will broaden educational opportunities and address pastoralist challenges across the country.

item.title: Ni Njeri: Hifadhi ya Wanyama Marekani Yampa Twiga Mchanga Jina Kutoka Kenya
item.description: Mama yake Njeri, Julu alijifungua Septemba na sasa Hifadhi ya Wanyama ya Oklahoma City Zoo and Botanical Garden iliomba umma kuwasaidia kuchagua jina la ndama huyoHifadhi hiyo ilipendekezea umma kuchagua kati ya majina Najuma, Acasia, Mosi na NjeriFamilia nyingine ya ndama huyo huyo ni Mashamba mwenye umri wa miaka miwili na Demetri mwenye umri wa miaka minne, baba yake Kioni na Njeri Hifadhi ya wanyama nchini Marekani imempa twiga mtoto jina la Njeri kufuatia shindano la kusaka jina mtandaoni.

item.description: - Kiplagat alimkashifu kinara wa Upinzani kwa kuchochea vyama vya kikabila tangu Kenya kupata uhuru na sasa anatakiwa kustaafu kwa taifa kusonga mbele - Spika huyo alishikilia kuwa endapo taifa hili litaendelea kubuni mirengo ya kikabila, basi utangamano utasalia ndoto - Kiplagat pia alimtaka Raila kutimiza ahadi yake aliyotoa wakati wa Uchaguzi Mkuu wa 2017 ambapo alisema hatawania tena urais Habari Nyingine: Raila ageuka mcheshi mtandaoni, awakuna mbavu wanamtandao

$75,000 Stolen At APC Headquarters
item.description: There was serious drama on Wednesday at the headquarters of the All Progressives Congress after a parcel containing $75,000 was stolen. According to reports, the cash was stolen while members of the party were struggling to gain access to the secretariat of the party. The ruling party started sale of nomination forms on Tuesday which has seen aspirants storm the party headquarters to purchase their form. It was gathered that canopies were set up in the premises of the secretariat due to the ongoing renovation.

item.title: Boko Haram, Bandit Terrorists Receiving Help From Govt
item.description: The convener of the Concerned Nigerians movement, Deji Adeyanju, has alleged that President Muhammadu Buhari-led government is supporting terrorist groups causing security challenges in the country. The human rights activist noted that bandit terrorists, Boko Haram insurgents and killer herdsmen are getting support and help from the government. Adeyanju further stated that the criminals are not more powerful than the military, DSS, Police and other security agencies in the country.

item.title: How to wash weave for reuse
item.description: Weaves and hair extensions are well known as a favorable method that women use to improve their image. They spend a lot of money to ensure that they get that gorgeous look. However, many women spend a lot of money on hair extensions only to have them last for a short period simply because of lack of proper instructions on how to wash and maintain the hair extensions. Fortunately, there's a solution.

item.title: Jimmy Walker (Golfer) - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American golfer who won the PGA Championship in 2016. He also won the Sony Open in Hawaii in 2014 and 2015. Before Fame He played college golf at Baylor University. Trivia He won the AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am in February 2014. Family Life His family moved from Oklahoma City to San Antonio, Texas when he was young. Associated With He defeated Jordan Spieth at the Valero Texas Open in March 2015.

item.title: Gunmen Abduct Ex-Imo Traditional Council Chair
item.description: The former chairman of the Imo State Council of Traditional Rulers, Eze Samuel Agunwa Ohiri, has been reportedly abducted by gunmen. Naija News learned that the monarch was abducted by the hoodlums in the early hours of Saturday from his residence in Orodo Mbaitoli LGA of Imo state. The unidentified gunmen had taken the monarch to an unknown destination and are yet to make a statement. Eze Ohiri is the traditional ruler of the Orodo autonomous community in Mbaitoli LGA of Imo and served as the state chairman of the traditional institution under Rochas Okorocha, former governor of the state.

item.title: Lagos Dispatch Rider Caught With Baby Inside Courier Box
item.description: A video on social media showed a yet-to-be-identified rider being beaten by the angry mob after a child was found inside the courier. Naija News learnt that the incident happened in Sangotedo in the early hours of Saturday, 12 March. However, details on the development were sketchy as at press time. In the video that surfaced on social media, the dispatch rider could be seen beaten by the angry mob who found the child inside the box.

item.title: Sokoto State News Today | Daily Updates
item.description: Current Governor: Ahmed Aliyu SokotoFounded: February 3, 1976Area: 25,973 km2Capital: SokotoGeopolitical Zone: North WestHD1 (2021): 0.336; low, 36 of 37ISO 3166 code: NG-SOPopulation: 3.6 millionPostal Code: 840001 Official WebsiteSlogan: Seat of the CaliphateBackgroundSokoto is a state in northwestern Nigeria, bordering the Republic of Niger to the north. It also shares boundaries with Kebbi state to the west and south and Zamfara to the south and east. Sokoto state occupies an area of short-grass savanna vegetation in the south and thorn scrub in the north.

item.title: Buhari Issues Fresh Directive To Party Leaders
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Thursday in Abuja told leaders of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) to avoid squabbles and disagreements. He added that any action that will jeopardize the chances of the party during the 2023 elections must be avoided. The President spoke while hosting leaders and members of the APC from the National Assembly at the Aso Rock Villa in Abuja. He said the leaders and members of the APC must avoid every form of distraction in the build-up to the party’s National Convention on Saturday as well as the 2023 general elections.

item.title: Buhari Swears In New Minister Of State, Works And Housing
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has sworn in the newly-appointed Minister of State for Works and Housing, Malam Muazu Sambo. Naija News reports that Buhari carried out the swearing-in on Friday shortly before the opening of the meeting of the National Security Council in the Presidential Villa in Abuja. Those in attendance of the security meeting include Vice President Yemi Osinbajo, the Secretary to the Government of the Federation, Boss Mustapha, Ministers of Justice, Defence, Interior, Police Affairs and Foreign Affairs.

item.title: Comedian Kurtis Conner Talks Cancel Culture: "No One Knows What They're Doing" (EXCLUSIVE)

Source: Kurtis ConnerSome might say that we’re in the golden age of stand-up comedy. Between social media newcomers and expert comedians making their shows accessible to a wider audience through Netflix specials, there’s no shortage of stand-up comedy to enjoy. And now, social media comedian Kurtis Conner is joining the ranks.

item.description: As more housemates are being unveiled for the Big Brother Naija ‘All-Stars’ edition, Venita, llebaye, Ike and Adekunle have revealed their uttermost aims for joining the reality show again. Naija News reports that the ‘All-Stars’ season, which includes selected former housemates from Pepper Dem, Double Wahala, See Gobe, Shine Ya Eye and other editions, would be battling for the N120 million grand prize. Apart from being interested in winning the money, IIebaya said she would continue from where she stopped, impact more on her fanbase and put herself out more for people to see who she really is.

item.title: How Thugs Attacked Me Inside Kogi Govt House After Meeting With Gov Bello
item.description: The senator representing Kogi East in the National Assembly, Isah Jibrin Echocho, has claimed that some thugs attacked him inside the Kogi State government house with knives and other dangerous weapons after a meeting with Governor Yahaya Bello. The Senator narrated that the incident happened when he and other All Progressives Congress (APC) federal lawmakers from the state, including Senator Sunday Karimi (Kogi West), visited Governor Bello in the spirit of the festive season.

item.title: Lagos: 80-Year-Old Man Commits Suicide
item.description: An 80-year-old man, identified as Isiyaka Ayinde, has reportedly taken his own life at the Watch Tower located in the Araromi Imota area of Lagos State. The incident, which has shocked the local community, occurred around 7:30 p.m. on Thursday, as confirmed by a police source to Punch. Details emerging from the investigation reveal that Ayinde was discovered by a tenant in the compound, who found the elderly man hanging in the kitchen with a rope around his neck.

item.title: Mpango wa kando wa Ruto asema kiasi cha PESA alichopewa, ataka zaidi
item.description: - Habari zinazidi kuibuka kuhusiana na udanganyifu wa Naibu wa Rais katika ndoa, katika uhusiano wa kimapenzi uliompa mtoto - Wawili hao walikutana na kumzaa mtoto huyo mwanamke huyo akiwa mwanafunzi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Moi Habari Nyingine: Njia 5 za kujua kuwa mwanamke mkenya anapanga kukutema Naibu wa Rais William Ruto ameshtakiwa na Priscah Chemutai Bett kwa kutelekeza majukumu yake ya kumtunza mwana wao. Kati hati ya Mahakama iliyowasilishwa mahakamani kupitia kwa wakili Gitobu Imanyara, Chemutai alieleza jinsi walivyokutana mwaka wa 2005 akiwa mwanafunzi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Moi, Eldoret.

item.title: Police Arrest Fake Army Captain In Lagos Over Alleged Theft
item.description: A man who was reportedly parading himself as a captain of the Nigerian Army has been arrested in Lagos State by operatives of the Nigeria Police Force, Naija News reports. The force Public Relations Officer, Benjamin Hundeyin confirmed in a statement on Sunday noon that the suspect, Andy Edwards, was nabbed by detectives of the command after allegedly robbing some ladies of their valuables, including cars. Hundeyin said the 39-year-old suspect in his last criminal act, paraded himself as a modelling agent, invited the unsuspecting ladies for auditioning and then robbed them of their cars and valuables at gunpoint.

item.title: Tobi Amusan Breaks African Women's Indoor Record
item.description: Nigerian sprinter, Tobi Amusan has set a new African women’s indoor record in the 60-meter event at the New Balance Indoor Grand Prix in Boston, clocking a time of 7.75 seconds. Tobi Amusan’s race in Boston has eclipsed the old mark of 7.77 seconds, set in January during the Astana Indoor Meet in Kazakhstan. Although she wasn’t first in Boston, she was able to add more accolades to her name.

item.title: Housewife Remanded For Murdering Her Seven-month-old Stepdaughter
item.description: A 20-year-old housewife, Lamratu Nasiru has been remanded in the Katsina Custodial Centre for allegedly murdering her step-daughter. According to Punch, the suspect and her co-wife, Zabbau were fighting when the suspect allegedly hit the baby girl’s head with a stick. The seven-month-old baby had sustained a serious injury from the blow and was rushed to the general hospital at Musawa, where she was confirmed dead by a certified medical doctor.

Naija News understands that trolls on the African Giant started after fellow singer and rapper, Sodiq Abubakar Yusuf, better known as CDQ took to his verified Twitter account to accused Burna Boy of showing no regard for the 36-year-old footballer. item.title: Keyamo Gives Update On Resumption Of Emirates Flight Operation In Nigeria
item.description: Minister of Aviation and Aerospace Development, Festus Keyamo, has said Emirates Airline will recommence flight operations in Nigeria very soon. Naija News recalls that in October 2022, Emirates Airline cancelled flight operations to Nigeria over its inability to repatriate funds trapped in the country. However, after President Bola Ahmed Tinubu visited the United Arab Emirates (UAE) in September, his spokesman, Ajuri Ngelale, said the visa ban imposed on Nigerians had been lifted and Emirates, alongside Etihad, would resume flights to Nigeria.

item.description: Igbo socio-cultural organization, Ohanaeze Ndigbo Worldwide has cautioned that the Northern Elders Forum (NEF) is treading a dangerous path by opposing the 2023 presidency. Ohanaeze in a statement on Sunday by its national publicity secretary, Alex Ogbonia said NEF is opposing zoning because it is not the turn of the north to produce Nigeria’s next President in 2023. He warned that the actions so far taken by NEF are capable of destroying the vital values that have given balance to Nigeria as a country for many years.

Umoafia competed in the 67kg category, in which he emerged as the overall best after lifting 135kg snatch and 165kg clean and jerk for a total of 300kg.

item.title: PDP Crisis: Wike Is An Asset To The Party
item.description: A former Deputy National Chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Chief Bode George has described the Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike as an asset to the party. George stated this amidst the crisis rocking the party and Wednesday’s declaration by the Wike camp not to support the PDP presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar except the party’s national chairman, Iyorchia Ayu resigns and is replaced by a southerner. He argued that when almost everyone deserted the PDP following its back-to-back losses in presidential elections, it was Wike that provided the needed leadership, and gave his all to ensure the party remains afloat and relevant.

item.title: Here Is What APC Said About Nigeria Becoming A Failed State Under Buhari
item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) has rubbished claims suggesting Nigeria has become a failed state under the leadership of President Muhammadu Buhari. The ruling party in a statement on Sunday by the Secretary of its Caretaker/Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee, Sen. John James Akpanudoedehe submitted that the Buhari administration is doing well in tackling the many challenges facing the nation. It also accused the opposition particularly the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) of sponsoring the allegations that Nigeria is becoming a failed state under Buhari’s guidance.

item.title: Kelechi Nwakali Believes Osimhen Will Help Super Eagles Win 2023 AFCON
item.description: Chaves midfielder, Kelechi Nwakali believes the Super Eagles can win the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations in Ivory Coast because of Victor Osimhen. Kelechi Nwakali, 25, who was included in the provisional squad for the 34th edition of the competition, said that consistency will be crucial for any success in Ivory Coast, despite the Super Eagles’ strength and diversity. Another crucial factor for the Eagles, according to Nwakali, heading to the tournament is Osimhen who was recently crowned African Footballer of the Year.

item.title: Notch - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Born Markus Persson, but better known as Notch, he is a Swedish video game designer who created the hit game Minecraft. In 2014, he became a billionaire when Microsoft purchased Minecraft for $2.5 billion. Before Fame He first began programming on a Commodore 128 at the age of seven and made his first game at the age of eight. Trivia He founded the video game development company Mojang Studios in 2009. His entries Breaking the Tower, Metagun, and Prelude of the Chambered all resulted from his participation in Ludum Dare's 48-hour game-making competition.

item.title: Queer Romance Film 'My Policeman' Is Loosely Based on an Unconventional Love Tale

In Michael Grandage's 2022 romance film My Policeman, a love triangle between a policeman named Tom (Harry Styles), a schoolteacher named Marion (Emma Corrin), and a museum curator named Patrick (David Dawson) emerges in 1950s England.

item.title: A Look at the HGTV Star's Past Marriage

Whether you know her as the host of the smash HGTV series Love It or List It, or as a respected businesswoman and designer, or even as a former actress from hit flicks like 1975's The Rocky Horror Picture Show, Hilary Farr — who is currently starring in her own home-reno spinoff called Tough Lough With Hilary Farr — has clearly enjoyed a successful career that has spanned several decades and included some pretty notable roles.

item.title: Bandit Terrorists Release 75 School Students In Zamfara
item.description: Bandit terrorists have released seventy-five students of Government Day Secondary School, Kaya, in Maradun Local Government Area of Zamfara State. The pupils were abducted by the terrorists during an invasion of their school on September 1, 2021. The development was confirmed by NTA in a post on their Facebook account on Sunday night. Recall that the state police command had claimed that the bandit terrorists abducted more than seventy students during an attack on the school.

item.title: Barry Sanders - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Legendary NFL running back who is widely considered the most talented rusher to ever play the game. He was the 1997 NFL MVP, a 10-time pro bowl selection and a 4-time rushing champion during his 10-year career, spent entirely with the Detroit Lions. Before Fame He won the 1988 Heisman Trophy while playing at Oklahoma State University. Trivia He became the first player to rush for over 1,500 yards in five separate seasons. In 1997, he rushed for 2,053 yards, becoming the third running back in NFL history to rush for over 2,000 yards in a season.

One such leader is Norway's prime minister, Erna Solberg, who held a press conference on Monday, March 16, specifically to address the nation's children. As much as adults are scared about the ramifications of the COVID-19 pandemic not just on individuals' health but on our world healthcare systems, our jobs, and our economies, it's probably a lot scarier for our kids.

item.description: Nollywood actor and philanthropist, Williams Uchemba has raised alarm over the rising water level of the Third Mainland Bridge. Naija News reports that the actor and father of one expressed concern after the Lagos government alerted residents in some parts of the state to be ready to relocate as a result of flooding. Recall, the commissioner for the environment, Tunji Bello said the state government is monitoring the Ogun River which flows directly into the Lagos lagoon.

item.title: Amaechi Loses At Supreme Court
item.description: 2023 presidential aspirant, Rotimi Amaechi has lost a bid to stop a probe instituted against him by the Rivers State government led by Nyesom Wike over an allegation of N96 billion fraud. This is as the Supreme Court on Friday dismissed the suit brought before it by Amaechi challenging the setting up of a seven-man probe panel against his administration for lack of merit. Naija News reports the apex court also awarded N1million cost against the former Minister of Transportation who recently resigned to pursue his 2023 presidential ambition.

item.title: VAT Saga: I Support Your Actions
item.description: Governor Samuel Ortom of Benue State has commended his Rivers and Lagos State counterparts over moves to domesticate the Value Added Tax law. Recall that Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers had recently signed a bill on VAT followed by an order requiring businesses to henceforth pay VAT to the state and not to the Federal Inland Revenue Service. He signed the bill following a judgment by a Federal High Court in Port Harcourt restraining the FIRS from collecting VAT in the state.

item.title: PDP Has Not Won Election, Already Too Arrogant Wike

The governor said the internal wrangling in the party is only telling Nigerians not to trust them ahead of the 2023 elections, adding that the crisis might be its doom in the 2023 general elections except the party changes.

item.title: Venezuela | Famous Birthdays
item.description: A country located at the northern end of South America.  It borders Guyana, Brazil, and Colombia. item.description: A chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Peter Ede, has officially joined the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Ebonyi State. Ede stated that he decided to join the APC because of its people-oriented policy and pledged to assist in building a better environment for the development of the state.

El-Rufai said the Kebbi school abduction is a danger signal to security in the North-West region. item.title: Alexander Grothendieck - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Mathematician known for creating the modern theory of algebraic geometry. His generalization of the classical Riemann-Roch theorem launched the study of algebraic and topological K-theory. Before Fame He studied mathematics at the University of Montpellier, but performed better when he studied independently. Trivia He ceased his work in mathematics in 1970 to focus on political activism for eighteen years before becoming stateless and relocating to the Pyrenees. Family Life His parents were anarchists who fled from Germany to France during World War II.

Naija News reports that the PDP governor gave the advisory in Ibadan, the state capital on Tuesday while speaking at the 65th birthday anniversary and thanksgiving service of Rev Samson Ayokunle, President of the Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN). Makinde warned against letting people who are as old as 70 years of age and above become president in 2023.

item.title: UNN Lecturer Speaks On Peter Obi's 'Pass' In Philosophy
item.description: A professor of Medical Microbiology & Molecular Genetics at the University of Nsukka, Prof. Ifeoma Ezeonu has reacted to the report making rounds that the presidential candidate of the Labour Party, Peter Obi, graduated with a pass in Philosophy. The lecturer in a post on her Twitter account said when she hears people talk about Obi studying Philosophy she laughs, wondering what he was looking for in that department. Ezeonu who noted that she didn’t meet Obi in school said she heard that he was busy with business while in UNN.

item.title: 400L UNILAG Student Abandons University To Start Afresh Abroad

The lady, who was already in year 4, said it was her dream to complete her studies in a Nigerian university before relocating abroad but the 2020 ASUU strike made her change her mind. The former UNILAG undergraduate said she had considered studying in the UK but she changed her mind because of the high cost of living, deciding to choose Finland.

item.title: Niger Governor Briefs Buhari In Aso Rock
item.description: The Niger State Governor, Abubakar Sani Bello has officially briefed President Muhammadu Buhari on the Kagara school abduction that occurred in the early hours of Wednesday. The Governor met with the President at the Aso Rock Villa in Abuja on Wednesday evening as confirmed by a presidential aide, Bashir Ahmad. He wrote on Wednesday evening: “Governor Abubakar Sani Bello of Niger State tonight, briefed President Muhammadu Buhari on the recent unfortunate incident, the abduction of staff and students of the Gov’t Science College Kagara, and the measures already put in place by the government to rescue all the captives.

item.title: Nigeria's Economy Was Only Good Under Obasanjo, Yar'adua And Jonathan
item.description: A former Deputy Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN),Kingsley Moghalu, argues that Nigeria’s economy has always been bad. Moghalu stated that the economy became good under the administration of Olusegun Obasanjo, late Umar Musa Yar’adua and Goodluck Jonathan. Making his argument in a statement released on his official X account, the former apex bank chief said that Nigeria’s economy fell under incompetent economic management in 2015 after the end of the Goodluck Jonathan administration.
