item.title: A MUST READ: Lagosians Groan As Power Shortage Bites
item.description: As electricity generation and distribution figures continue to dip, residents of Lagos continue to lament the losses they incur. * Lagos State Governor, Babatunde Fashola yet to redeem his promise on Electricity According to a recent report from the Power Holding Company of Nigeria, PHCN, the country currently generates less 4000 megawatts of electricity. Lagos, the nation’s commercial hub gets less than 700 of the number.  As at January this year, there was a sharp fall in power generation from 6,668 to just about 3,764 for the consumption of Nigeria’s population estimated at over 170 million.

item.title: Oyetola Replies Adeleke Over Comment On Looting States Assets
item.description: The outgoing Governor of Osun State, Gboyega Oyetola, has urged the governor-elect, Ademola Adeleke to start planning toward delivering his electoral promises to the people instead of “peddling lies and propaganda” to earn public sympathy. This comes after Adeleke’s spokesperson, Mallam Olawale Rasheed, in a statement on Thursday, accused Oyetola’s appointees of looting the state’s properties under the governor’s supervision. “We have it on good authority that Osun state assets within the state, Kogi, Lagos, Abuja and outside the country are being tampered with for private acquisition,” Adeleke had alleged.

item.title: September 14 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Your sign's ruling planet is Mercury, but as you were born in the third Decan, or part, of the sign, Venus also lends you some of its planetary influence. Mercury is the planet of communication and subsequently fosters a strong mind and social abilities within you. Venus on the other hand, is the planet of harmony, which relates to your sensitivity, as well as your appreciation for art, beauty and cooperation.

item.description: - Kemi Badenoch, a Nigerian of the Conservative Party, has won her re-election in the UK general election polling 39,714 votes - With the whopping votes, she defeated all her rivals by a wide margin as Liberal Democrat Hibbs scored miserly votes of 12,120 - In her appreciation speech, she spoke about how she could not have done it without the staunch backing of her supporters Another Nigerian has won their re-election in the United Kingdom election.

item.title: 'Bishop Oyedepo's Winners Chapel Sacked Me, Others For Not Making Enough Money'
item.description: Peter Godwin, who claimed to be a former pastor of the Living Faith Church International, popularly known as Winners Chapel, has alleged that he was sacked for failing to make enough money. According to SaharaReporters, Godwin stated, in a video, that he was employed on the 28th of August, 2020. According to the former pastor, he alongside forty of his colleagues were invited by the state pastor on July 1, 2021, and were all sacked over low income in their branches.

item.title: DSS 'Arrests' EFCC Chairman, Ibrahim Magu
item.description: The Department of State Services (DSS) has reportedly arrested the acting Chairman of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC), Ibrahim Magu. A report monitored on SaharaReporters by Naija News says the EFCC Chairman was arrested over allegations that he owns four properties and that he was allegedly transferring funds abroad through a third party. Magu, who was arrested at the Wuse II office of the DSS in Abuja, Nigeria’s capital on Monday afternoon, is undergoing interrogation at the DSS Headquarters In Aso Drive.

item.title: First Bank Names Billionaire Femi Otedola Major Shareholder As He Makes N543m In 8hrs
item.description: The First Bank Of Nigeria has confirmed billionaire Femi Otedola as the largest individual share holder. This is coming months after a faceoff between two billionaires Otedola and Tunde Hassan-Odukale. In it’s latest report, the bank revealed that Otedola has amassed 7.56% of its shares and this helped him earn over N543 million on Thursday. According to the report, the billionaire has a direct holding of 0.58% direct stake and 6.

item.title: IPOB Sends Message To Judge, Gives Reason To Release Him In Next Trial
item.description: The Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB has given reasons why Justice Binta Nyako of an Abuja Federal High Court should acquit and discharge their leader, Nnamdi Kanu in the next court hearing. IPOB stated that discharging Kanu in the next trial date which is on April 8, 2022, would prove that the judge is not biased and has not been compromised. IPOB’s spokesman, Emma Powerful, said this on Sunday in a statement.

item.title: See The Six Conditions Given By WHO To End COVID-19 Lockdown In Nigeria
item.description: The World Health Organization has given conditions that must be met by countries including Nigeria before restrictions and lockdowns imposed due to the coronavirus pandemic can be lifted. Director-General of the World Health Organisation, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, gave the conditions on Thursday during his weekly address to Geneva-based diplomats. Tedros noted that the conditions must be met to prevent another surge of infections which could be worse than the initial situation.

item.title: The Cast of 'Survivor 41' Will Have Some New Challenges to Face
item.description: The cast for Season 41 of the hit CBS show 'Survivor' has finally been announced — and the castaways will be facing some new challenges. Source: CBSA new season of Survivor is coming up, and the new cast of competitors has already been announced. It's no surprise that after 40 seasons, the game will be played a bit differently this time around, making it more challenging for the competitors. The Season 41 cast won't be able to use the previous seasons as a guide this time, as the changes are bound to stir up some trouble between them.

item.title: Donnie Swaggart - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Religious leader who is known for being an Evangelist preacher. He has also run his own place of worship called the Family Worship Center Church in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. Before Fame He found ministerial influence in his father, Jimmy Swaggart. He often attended worship sessions growing up, which influenced his own decision to preach. Trivia His sermons have been known to be regularly telecast on the SonLife Broadcasting Network. He has also released a line of religious and teaching DVDs, which often include his family in Louisiana.

Trivia She has won numerous awards including four New Zealand Music Awards. Family Life She comes from a Croatian and Irish family.

item.description: Modern societies have shown a serious concern for their children's education for various reasons. Therefore, it is common to find that governments have a uniform and elaborate curriculum that guides the education sector within their countries. For learners, teachers and parents, knowing the scheme of work would help them to understand what the curriculum is about. Nigeria has knowledge and skills-based curriculum that is beneficial to learners at all levels.

item.title: Why Can't I See Sensitive Content on Twitter? How to Fix It
item.description: Some users have noticed that they can't see potentially sensitive content on Twitter, and want to know how they can change that setting. Every social media platform has some sort of filter or censor which is designed to keep certain pieces of content from being distributed widely across the site. While those warnings are a smart way to control the kinds of content that are posted on a platform like Twitter, some users have recently noticed that they can't see potentially sensitive content that's posted on the social media site.

item.title: Does Ansel Elgort Have an OnlyFans? The Actor Posts Nudes for Charity
item.description: Ansel Elgort just shared a nude photo with fans asking to buy more on his OnlyFans, but it turns out he's working to get eyes on a charity. Remember model Kyla Ward, better known as "The Naked Philanthropist", who sold nude photos to raise money for Australian bushfire relief efforts? She tweeted out in January that she would send a nude photo to anyone who donated at least $10 to the relief efforts and she stayed true to her word, even after she faced backlash for it.

item.title: Manchester United Set To Sack Ole Gunnar Solskjaer
item.description: Norwegian professional football manager, Ole Gunnar Solskjær is set to be sacked by Manchester United. Naija News understands that the Red Devils on Saturday suffered another humiliating defeat to Watford in an English Premier League away match. Watford who currently seats in the 16 position in the league table thrashed United to 4-1 in a more embarrassing play following a return from the International break. Though an official statement concerning Solskjaer’s contract termination has not been made public, reports claimed that the 48-year-old manager will be relieved of his duties as Manchester United’s manager.

item.title: Nine Top Nigerian Celebrities Who Lost Their Mums, Son, Daughter In 2023
item.description: Losing a family member or loved one is not something anybody prays for, but almost everyone has had to endure this pain at one point or another in life, especially the loss of parents. In this article, Naija News compiles a list of Nigerian celebrities who lost a loved one in 2023. 1. Chizzy Alichi: On December 16, Nollywood actress Chizzy Alichi announced her father’s demise. In a post via her Instagram page, the bereaved actress wondered how her father could die without carrying her children.

item.title: Orji Kalu Returns To School Amid Senate Presidency Bid
item.description: Senate Chief Whip and former Governor of Abia State, Orji Uzor Kalu has returned to his Alma Mater, Harvard Business School in the United States of America, for studies. Kalu, one of the leading contenders for the Senate Presidency position, disclosed this via his verified Facebook account on Thursday, upon his arrival in the United States. The Senate chief whip whose first enrolment in Harvard Business School dated back to 1997, said he gained a lot of experience and insight in the early years he studied at the institution.

item.title: Did the Crabfeeder Have Greyscale in 'House of the Dragon'? Fans Seem to Think so

Already hailed as a commendable anti-hero with a flair for staging a hair-raising murder series, the Crabfeeder (Daniel Scott-Smith) emerged in Season 1 of House of the Dragon as the baddie who has absolutely no reservations about feeding the bodies of his sworn enemies to the crabs.

item.description: Former defensive tackle and defensive end who played for the New York Giants and Washington Redskins. He became an actor after retirement, appearing in the action film S.W.A.T and the comedy Dodgeball. Before Fame He starred on the Foothill High School football team in Tustin, California. Trivia His senior year at San Diego State he was second team All-Western Athletic Conference. Family Life He grew up in the Southern California area with his parents and older brother John, a fellow NFL player.

item.title: Roo Powell Talks 'Undercover Underage' Decoys, and Her SOSA Work (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Roo Powell poses as teenagers online to catch predators on 'Undercover Underage.' Plus, details on her work with SOSA, and how she creates convincing decoy personas. After Roo Powell spent a week posing as an 11-year-old girl on the internet, she wrote about the experience in a 2019 essay for Medium. The piece went viral, and she realized that she wanted to focus her full attention on child advocacy work. Roo started the nonprofit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse), which aims to educate parents, guardians, and teens about online safety.

item.title: You Can Blame COVID-19 for [SPOILER]'s departure from 'Zoey's Extraordinary Playlist'
item.description: Fans were saddened to learn that fan-favorite, Joan, is leaving 'Zoey's Extraordinary Playlist.' The character is moving to Singapore, but Lauren Graham is also leaving the show IRL. Source: NBCIf you watched the Season 2 premiere of Zoey's Extraordinary Playlist last night, you probably found yourself grieving for one of the show's best characters, Joan (Zoey's boss). Joan, who's played by Lauren Graham, is leaving because she's learned she has to move to Singapore in order to take charge of the Asian division of the company.

item.title: Abubakar Shekau Debunks Death Claims In New Video
item.description: Boko Haram leader, Abubakar Shekau or his clone, said to have been killed in Konduga last month by Nigerian military has announced that he is alive and will die only when Allah says so. In a 36-minute video obtained by AFP, Shekau not only debunked reports by Nigerian military that he was dead but said members of his sect were running a Caliphate in the captured towns, north east of Nigeria.

item.title: How Top Nollywood Actresses Celebrate With Their Kids On Children's Day
item.description: Some top Nollywood actresses such as, Mercy Johnson, Tonto Dikeh, Osas Ighodaro, Toyin Lawani have taken to their individual social media to mark the 2023 Children’s Day. The proud mothers via their Instagram on Saturday shared beautiful photos and videos of their children, wishing them a fun day. Posing with her four kids, Mercy Johnson wrote on Instagram, “My greatest blessings call me “Mom”…Happy Children’s Day To My Besties Mummy Loves you so much…So much and you are all that matters.

item.title: Kumuyi Speaks On Endorsing Presidential Candidate, Discloses Who Nigerians Should Vote For
item.description: The General Overseer of Deeper Christian Life Ministry, Dr. Williams Kumuyi, has shared his thoughts on endorsing a presidential candidate ahead of the 2023 election. Speaking on Wednesday, in Jalingo, Taraba state capital during the first ever Global Church Workers Conference, the clergyman said that he would not be caught up in the web of recommending or disqualifying anyone vying for the seat of the President. He opined that Nigerians should be allowed to choose who would rule them democratically and prayers should be sustained for God to make their choice the best for the country.

item.title: Nigerian Stock Exchange Delists Union Diagnostics
item.description: The Nigerian Stock Exchange has delisted a medical diagnostics firm, Union Diagnostics, from the stock market. Naija News reports the company decided to delist from the main board of the stock exchange after its shareholders approved the delisting of the company’s shares at the last Annual General Meeting on January 25, 2021. It was learned that the decision to delist from the Exchange by the company was motivated by certain challenges around the inability to raise capital to fund expansions.

item.description: The Presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Ahmed Tinubu, on Thursday night visited Vice President Yemi Osinbajo at his residence in the Presidential Villa, Abuja. Tinubu, who had earlier visited President Muhammadu Buhari, stopped by to visit Osinbajo, one of the aspirants in the APC Presidential primary election held on Tuesday and Wednesday. In a tweet via his Twitter handle, Osinbajo’s spokesman, Laolu Akande said the vice president got a call that Tinubu would stop by to greet him and have a talk.

item.title: "Disney Plus & Thrust" Social Media Coins New "Hook Up" Phrase
item.description: After Disney launched their streaming service on Nov. 12, social media reacts to the new "hook up" catchphrase "Disney Plus and thrust." If you’re a millennial, you’ve probably heard of (or have even used) the phrase “Netflix and chill.” The simple slogan that your parents may think means to binge-watch movies for hours on the streaming service has become known as a euphemism for sexual activity. The viral catchphrase fueled by memes, GIFs, tweets, and more, has translated into the English language as a slang term to mean “hooking up.

item.title: Intrigue As IGP Baba Redeploys DIG Egbunike 24-hrs To Election
item.description: Barely 24-hours to the November 6th Anambra State Governorship election, the Inspector-General of Police (IGP), Alkali Usman Baba, has redeployed the Deputy Inspector General of Police (DIG), Joseph Egbunike. Naija News recalls that the IGP had deployed Egbunike and the DIG in charge of Operations, Acting DIG Zaki Ahmed, to oversee the security personnel and operations in the Anambra election. While some of his patients end up losing hundreds of pounds with the help of bariatric surgery, others struggle to drop any significant amount of weight.

item.title: "This Is Not Acceptable" - NLC Reacts As FG Increases Electricity Tariff
item.description: The Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) has condemned the latest increase in electricity tariff by the federal government of Nigeria. NLC on Wednesday through its deputy president, Comrade Joe Ajaero rejected the increase, describing it as insensitive and unacceptable. Ajaero who spoke when he appeared as a guest on Channels TV disclosed that stakeholders, particularly the committee working on the new electricity tariff regime were not carried along before announcing the decision to the public.

item.title: Ayu Asks New PDP BoT Chairman To Reach Out To Wike, Fayose, Makinde, Others
item.description: The National Chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Senator Iyorchia Ayu, has urged the newly appointed chairman of the party’s Board of Trustees (BoT), Adolphus Wabara, to reach out to aggrieved members of the party. Naija News reports that Ayu made the plea when he led the party’s national working committee (NWC) to visit Adolphus Wabara at his residence on Friday. Recall that Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State and his allies have demanded Ayu’s resignation as a condition for resolving the crisis.

item.title: Fast Food Cup Illusion Angers Internet
item.description: This Fast Food Cup Illusion Has The Internet Thinking All Drink Sizes Are The SameBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:36 p.m. ET Source: twitterEveryone loves a good magic trick. It's probably why both The Prestige and The Illusionist came out at almost the exact same time and people didn't complain about there being too many period piece magician films. And also why everyone, from celebrities to normal peeps like you and me on the street, are completely dumbfounded by magicians like David Blaine.

item.title: Is This Really 'The Buhari Best' He And Obasanjo Referred?
item.description: When elder statesman Olusegun Obasanjo, in his wisdom, declared last December that President Muhammadu Buhari had done his best in tackling the deteriorating state of insecurity in the country and that expecting more from the Commander-in-Chief was tantamount to kicking a dead horse, Information Minister, Lai Mohammed, called a press conference to declare that for the former President “to say he has nothing more to offer is untrue, fallacious and smacks of dirty politicking.

Reality TV Star Kourtney Kardashian, Husband Expecting First Child
item.description: Reality Star Kourtney Kardashian Barker and her husband, Travis Barker are expecting their first child. Kourtney made this known during her husband’s concert with Blink-183/2 in Los Angeles on Friday, June 16th by holding up a sign that read, “Travis, I’m Pregnant.” In the video shared on her Instgarm, Kourtney held the placard embossed with the words, “I’m pregnant” as he performed on stage, while screaming in excitement. After seeing his wife’s sign, Travis jumped off the stage and ran toward his wife to give her a big kiss.

item.title: Putin Reacts As Wagner Group Declares War On Russian Military
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has described the threats by a private mercenary group, Wagner Group, to declare war on the country’s military, as “high treason”. Naija News reported that the leader of the mercenary group, Yevgeny Prigozhin, had on Friday vowed to topple the nation’s military leaders after accusing the Russian Army of killing his men. Prigozhin said his fighters had crossed the border from Ukraine, where they had been fighting alongside Russia, into Rostov-on-Don, a Russian city, and would destroy anyone in their way, including roadblocks and aircraft.

item.title: Muslim-Muslim Ticket: Christians Have To Protect Osinbajo
item.description: A member of the Ondo State House of Assembly, Tomide Akinribid, has called on Nigerians to protect Vice President, Yemi Osinbajo for reportedly refusing to be part of Bola Tinubu’s campaign council. Naija News recall that Osinabjo’s name was missing from the list of the Presidential Campaign Council (PCC) of the All Progressives Congress (APC) which was released on Friday. Reacting to the reactions that trailed Osinbajo’s name from the list, the council stated that President Muhammadu Buhari ordered that the Vice President and the Secretary to the Government of the Federation, Boss Mustapha, be left out.

item.title: 25 Quotes on Determination, Persistence, and More
item.description: 25 Quotes to Remind You Never to Give up on Your DreamsBy Pippa RagaUpdated July 16 2020, 1:19 p.m. ET Source: istockThere are days when it's hard to feel anything other than demoralized and frustrated, but on those days in particular, it's crucial to keep our determination, perseverance, and a healthy perspective. Sometimes, the best thing we can use for an encouragement and self-confidence boost are empowering quotes reminding us never to give up in the face of hardship, and to help us realize that, with a little slow and steady persistence, we will make it through to the other end more refreshed, and more driven.

item.title: Release Date, Plot, Cast, More
item.description: Season 2 of Apple TV Plus's 'The Afterparty' Will Be Here Before You Know ItBy Toni SuttonUpdated Jan. 19 2023, 2:37 p.m. ET Source: Apple TV PlusIn January 2022, the murder-mystery comedy series The Afterparty debuted on Apple TV Plus and became an instant hit with audiences. Season 1 took place at a high school reunion afterparty at a palatial cliffside mansion. However, the estate soon became a crime scene when its owner, the nerdy ska-kid turned pop icon/movie star Xavier (Dave Franco), wound up dead.

item.title: Reno Omokri Reacts To Fani Kayode's EFCC Saga
item.description: A former aide to former Nigerian President Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, Reno Omokri has taken to social media to react to the arrest saga of former Minister of Aviation, Femi Fani-Kayode. Naija News had reported earlier that Nigeria’s anti-graft agency, the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC, on Tuesday, November 23 arrested FFK. The former minister was said to have arrived at the Lagos office of the anti-graft agency at about 1 pm yesterday in the company of his lawyer.

item.title: Tanker Crushes Hawker To Death In Lagos
item.description: There was commotion today in the Berger area of Lagos after a moving tanker crushed a hawker to death on the Otedola bridge. Naija News learnt that the diesel-laden tanker with number plate GME 483XD also rammed into three moving vehicles during the tragic accident. Confirming the accident in a statement made available to newsmen, the Permanent Secretary of the Lagos State Emergency Management Agency (LASEMA), Dr Olufemi Oke-Osanyintolu, said the accident happened after the tanker suffered a mechanical fault while in motion.

item.title: FG Probes Allegations Of Oil Theft, Sabotage Against Naval Chief, Ogalla
item.description: The Federal Government has vowed to probe allegations of coordinated oil bunkering scheme and multibillion-naira contract-splitting fraud levelled against the Chief of Naval Staff, Emmanuel Ogalla. The Minister of State for Defence, Bello Matawalle, made this known in a press statement released Friday by his spokesman, Henshaw Ogubike. Naija News understands that Ogalla is facing allegations of impropriety on many fronts since his clandestine dealings came to light, details of which had reached top levels of the chain of command and on the verge of being brought to the notice of President Bola Tinubu.

He called on those of them that are not Muslims to convert to Islam and warned those who are already Muslims not to think they will be able to do anything against him because their own version of Islam is ‘fake.

item.description: Gunmen suspected to be bandit terrorists have reportedly killed six people and kidnapped many others in the Tureta Local Government Area of Sokoto State. Naija News reports that Tureta shares a border with Zamfara State where the Nigerian military had upper it’s offensive against bandits. Recall that the Zamfara state government had shut down mobile networks to help operations against the terrorists. Bandit have continually attacked Sokoto, Niger, Katsina, Zamfara and many other states in North-West and North-Central Nigeria.

item.title: Huge demand for donkey skin from China threatening existence of the animals in Kenya
item.description: Millions of donkeys are at risk because of rapidly growing demand for ‘ejiao’, a product made from donkey skins used in traditional Chinese medicine. A recent report by the Kenya Agricultural and Livestock Research Organisation (KALRO) predicted that donkeys in Kenya could be effectively wiped out by 2023. READ ALSO: Kenya Power dismisses 13 employees over KSh 35 million stolen tokens READ ALSO: 'Mighty' whirlwind appears at controversial pastor Bushiri’s church According to a separate report by The Brook Organisation, Donkeys across the globe are being killed for their skins to meet the ever-increasing demand from China.

item.title: Tinubus Silence Despite Serious Crisis' In APC Worries Loyalists
item.description: Ahead of this Saturday’s local government area congresses of the All Progressives Congress (APC), some party stakeholders are calling on former Lagos governor and APC leader, Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, to weigh in on what they considered as serious crisis in the party. This is with respect to President Muhammadu Buhari’s endorsement of Governor Mai Mala Buni of Yobe State to continue as the Chairman, Caretaker/Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee (CECPC) of the ruling party.

According to Muhammad, the vessel has been carrying out the illegal operation for the past twelve years.

item.title: Nigerian Leaders Are Corrupt, Buhari Does Not Listen
item.description: The overseer of the Citadel Global Community Church, formerly known as Latter Rain Assembly, Tunde Bakare, has stated that Nigerian leaders are corrupt. Speaking with BBC Yoruba, Bakare said Nigerian leaders have steered the country to its current state. He said President Muhammadu Buhari never listened to his ideas, adding that many people voted for Buhari because they thought that, as a former military leader, he would be able to lead the country on the right path.

item.title: Fayemi Invokes Jonathans Line As Campaigns Begin
item.description: The Governor of Ekiti State, Kayode Fayemi, has warned politicians jostling to succeed him in 2022 by paraphrasing former President Goodluck Jonathan’s 2015 catchphrase that his ambition to remain in power is not worth the blood of any Nigerian. Speaking in Ado-Ekiti at a “State-of-The-State” programme lined up as part of activities to mark his third year anniversary as governor on Friday, Fayemi declared that, “No position is worth the blood of anybody”.

item.title: Gov. Bello Evacuated By Helicopter As Commuters Are Stuck On Abuja-Kaduna Expressway
item.description: The Governor of Niger State, Abubakar Bello was evacuated by a helicopter when his convoy got stuck in a gridlock on the Abuja-Kaduna highway on Sunday. It was gathered that Bello was caught up in the gridlock, while returning to his state after paying a condolence visit to the Emir of Zazzau, Ahmed Nuhu Bamali over the death of Hammanu Dauda. The Niger State Governor was airlifted from the gridlock by a helicopter while other commuters remained stranded on the highway, according to a report on Monday monitored by our correspondent on Arise News.

Naija News earlier reported that Joshua showcased his dominance in the ring by delivering a stunning second-round knockout against the former UFC heavyweight champion on Saturday. The boxing match, which took place in Riyadh in Saud Arabia, captivated the sports world and highlighted Joshua’s superior boxing skills and experience against the mixed martial arts star.

item.title: National Convention: "Don't Destroy Our Chances In 2023"
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has warned members of the All Progressive Congress, APC to desist from taking any action that would jeopardize the party’s chances in the upcoming 2023 election. The president made the statement on Friday ahead of the party’s national convention which will be held on Saturday at Eagle Square in Abuja. He reminded the party chieftains of the limited time frame of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) timetable, noting that the party does not have time for any frivolities that would not benefit the party positively.

item.title: Nwaoboshi Dumps PDP For APC [Photos]
item.description: The lawmaker representing Delta North in the Senate, Senator Peter Nwaoboshi, has dumped the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for the All Progressives Congress (APC). The Chairman of the APC Caretaker Committee and Governor of Yobe State, Mai Mala Buni, made this known on Friday when he presented Nawaoboshi to President Muhammadu Buhari at the Presidential Villa. The APC caretaker chairman warmly welcomed the lawmaker and briefed the President on how they have managed the affairs of the party in the past year.

item.title: Tribunal Sacks Adeleke As Osun Governor
item.description: The Osun State Election Petition Tribunal chaired on Friday has sacked Osun Governor, Ademola Adeleke. The ruling was given by a three-men panel led by Justice Tertse Kume. The majority judgement of two judges against one ordered that the Certificate of Return should be withdrawn from Adeleke and issued to Adegboyega Oyetola. The majority judgement which was read by the Chairman, Justice Tertse Kume said Oyetola scored the majority lawful votes of 314, 921 against Adeleke’s 290, 266.

item.title: Tension As Police Arrest NNPP Leader In Borno, Take Over Secretariat
item.description: Heavily armed security personnel of the Nigeria Police Force have reportedly arrested the leader of the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP) in Borno State. Reports reaching Naija News at the moment revealed that the personnel on Thursday (today), stormed and took over the party’s secretariat in Maiduguri, the state capital. Information about the event is still sketchy at the moment. It was reported, however, that some developments yesterday at the NNPP secretariat situated around the Abbaganaram ward of the metropolis, caused the uproar.

item.title: The Internet Hates the Narrator in 'The Movies That Made Us'
item.description: Who narrates 'The Movies that Made Us’? The Netflix docuseries focuses on the most influential movies ever — but viewers can't get past the narrator. Source: NetflixWith the decade quickly coming to an end, it seems like everyone is eager to feel some nostalgia. Cue Netflix's docuseries, The Movies that Made Us. The four episodes cover just a few of the most beloved and influential movies in American cinematic history: Dirty Dancing, Home Alone, Die Hard, and Ghostbusters.

item.title: PDP Officially Flags Off Presidential Campaign In Akwa Ibom (Photos)
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) ahead of the 2023 general election has officially flagged off its presidential campaign in Akwa Ibom State. Naija News gathered that the presidential campaign is been held at the Nest of Champions Stadium in Uyo, the state capital. Some of the dignitaries in attendance at the event, include the presidential candidate of the party, Atiku Abubakar, his running mate and Governor of Delta State, Ifeanyi Okowa and the Governor of Akwa Ibom State, Udom Emmanuel.

item.title: How This Italian Art Museum Is Winning TikTok
item.description: This Italian Art Museum Is Officially Winning TikTokBy Abi TravisUpdated June 29 2020, 3:13 p.m. ET Source: TikTok/@uffizisocialWhen you think of an art museum, you might picture a stodgy, airless room filled with crusty old paintings and stagnant sculptures. And, to be fair, a lot of art museums are exactly that. However, there’s a whole contingent of museum workers who are putting a lot of effort into changing that perception. After all, if the art world wants to continue past the current generation, we’re gonna need a bunch of younger people to get interested in art.

item.title: Northern Governors Are Destroying Basic Education
item.description: The Federal Government has accused some Northern Governors of destroying education at the primary school level through bad policy. The Minister of Education, Adamu Adamu, made the accusation during a Ministerial Media Briefing organized by the Presidential Communications Team at the Presidential Villa, Abuja. Adamu, who was flanked by the Minister of State for Education, Goodluck Opia, said basic education in several northern states has failed due to poor policy by the governors.

item.title: Heavy Security As FG Set To Arraign Nnamdi Kanus Co-accused On Terrorism
item.description: Heavy security presence has been reported at the Federal High Court in Abuja as the Federal Government is set to arraign Nnamdi Kanu’s co-accused on terrorism charges. Reports reaching Naija News at the moment confirmed that the arraignment is scheduled to hold before Justice Binta Nyako of the FHC on Wednesday (today). As of when this report was given, the four accused, Bright Chimezie, Chidiebere Onwudike, Benjamin Maduagwu and David Nwaurusi are already seated in the courtroom waiting for the proceeding.

item.title: Umahi Mocks Nnamdi Kanu Over Sit-at-home Order
item.description: Governor David Umahi of Ebonyi State has mocked the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu, over the sit-at-home order declared by the proscribed group. In a live broadcast to commemorate his six years in office at the old Government House, Abakaliki, on Saturday, Umahi described the directive of IPOB as an act of foolishness. He asserted that freedom fighters should not be outside the country and vomiting rubbish, advising Kanu to come to Nigeria and dialogue with the governors.

item.title: Charles Lazarus - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: American entrepreneur who founded the children's toy store Toys "R" Us. At age twenty-five, he opened the baby furniture store Children's Bargain Town in Washington, D.C. Trivia He stepped down as Chairman and CEO of Toys "R" Us in 1994 but remained with the company as Chairman Emeritus.

item.title: Fubara, Diri, Akpabio, Other Dignitaries Attend Wigwe's Burial (Photos)
item.description: Politicians, businessmen, captains of industry, and other dignitaries have arrived at the Redeemed Christian Church of God (RCCG) in Isiokpi, Ikwerre Local Government Area of Rivers State, for Herbert Wigwe‘s funeral service. Naija News reports that the church will host the funeral service for the former Chief Executive Officer of Access Bank Plc, his wife, Doreen, and son, Chizzy. Governor Siminalayi Fubara of Rivers State, Governor Douye Diri of Bayelsa State, Dr Godknows Igali, a former Nigerian Ambassador, Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu of Lagos State and Governor Dapo Abiodun of Ogun State were among those who have arrived.

item.title: Neymar Slammed With $3.3 Million Fine In Brazil
item.description: The Brazilian authorities penalized Paris Saint Germain forward, Neymar $3.3 million on Monday for constructing a lake on his property outside of Rio de Janeiro without an environmental permit. Neymar Junior’s disputed mansion in Brazil is located in Mangaratiba, which is 80 miles (130 km) from the country’s capital, Rio. The Brazilian football icon bought the house in 2016. According to Brazilian media, it has a heliport, spa, and gym and is situated on a 10,000 square meter (107,000 square foot) plot of land.

item.title: Pastor Tobi Cancels Annual Birthday Party
item.description: Following the death of Ifeanyi Adeleke,son of Nigerian singer, Davido, popular UK-based cleric, Pastor Tobi Adegboyega has cancelled his annual birthday celebration.  The clergyman whose birthday is slated for November 11 took to his social media earlier today to announce the cancellation of the celebration. According to Tobi, his household is broken from the news of Davido’s son death, hence the need to do away with this year birthday bash. He added that the entire church stands in solidarity for the bereaved family (the Adelekes) in their trying times.

item.title: Update Emerges On Mr Ibu's Health (Full Details)
item.description: Popular Nigerian actor, John Okafor, professionally known as Mr Ibu, has undergone five surgeries which were all successful. Naija News recalls that the actor while celebrating his 63rd birthday from the hospital bed, appealed to Nigerians to come to his aid in settling his medical bills. Mr Ibu had claimed that he was battling an ailment that may cost him his leg. In a recent statement shared via his Instagram page, the actor said he had undergone five surgeries which were all successful.

This newest offering from SYFY is a 12-episode weekly series starring Christie Burke (The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn), Richard Fleeshman (Coronation Street, The Sandman), and Reece Ritchie (10,000 BC) among others.

item.title: BBNaija S7: 'Your Entire Generation Will Be Wiped Off'
item.description: Popularly Nollywood actor, dina Adinma, has rained heavy curses on fans of Big Brother Naija Season 7 Housemate, Phyna. Reacting to this, dina in a post shared on Twitter, claimed that Phyna was too bossy as the HOH and might possibly beat Bella if not for the BBNaija rules.

item.title: Gunshots As Imo Speaker Suspends Minority Leader, Five Others Indefinitely
item.description: The Speaker of the Imo State House of Assembly, Paul Emezim, on Tuesday suspended the minority leader, Anyadike Nwosu, and five other lawmakers. Naija News gathered that this led to major tension in the State Assembly complex. In an emergency plenary held under tight security, the speaker suspended the lawmakers indefinitely for what he called “unparliamentary conduct”. Apart from the minority leader, who is of the Peoples Democratic Party, other lawmakers suspended by the speaker were: the immediate past majority leader, Uche Ogbuagu,(Ikeduru, APC), Onyemaechi Njoku(Ihitte- Uboma, APC), Kennedy Ibeh,(Obowo, APC), Philip Ejiogu,( Owerri North, PDP) and Dominic Ezerioha (Oru West, APC).

item.title: EBOLA: Schools To Resume By October - FG

item.title: 137 Reasons To Vote Atiku, I Really Feel Sorry For PDP
item.description: In their bid to sell their candidates to Nigerians while discouraging votes for the opposition, former presidential aide, Reno Omokri and former Minister of Aviation, Femi Fani-Kayode, have taken to their separate social media pages to woo their followers ahead of the 2023 general elections. Naija News reports that Omokri who is a staunch supporter of the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar, took to Twitter on Tuesday morning to announce he will be revealing one hundred and thirty-seven reasons Nigerians should vote for Wazirin Adamawa in the February 25 polls.

item.title: 5 facts to know about new COAS Major-General Attahiru
item.description: Whereas some Nigerians feel the decision of President Muhammadu Buhari to bring onboard new service chiefs is a step long overdue, his choice of the new Chief of Army Staff (COAS), Major-General Ibrahim Attahiru must have come as shock to many. PAY ATTENTION: Join Legit.ng Telegram channel! Never miss important updates! This is because Attahiru in July 2017 was sacked as the theatre commander of the joint task force for failing to capture the leader of the Boko Haram terrorist group, Abubakar Shekau, by his predecessor, Tukur Buratai.

The twins starred in a number of films in the '90s and also went on to run their own fashion brands. Before Fame She and Mary-Kate were born in Sherman Oaks, California to Jarnette and David Olsen. Trivia Among the many movies she and Mary-Kate star in as young actresses are It Takes Two, Billboard Dad and Passport to Paris.

item.title: Guy Goes on 1st Date With Neighbor, Comes Home to Insane Note
item.description: Man Finds Handwritten Note on Door from Neighbor Asking Why He Ghosted Him After One DateBy Mustafa GatollariPublished Feb. 22 2023, 3:38 p.m. ET Source: GettyOne of the most difficult things human beings can conquer is loneliness. It's why a lot of people rush into marriages or try to lay the groundwork for a long-term relationship with people they'd probably otherwise not be so crazy about, just because the pangs of loneliness are too painful to bear.

item.title: Wike Makes First Public Appearance After Losing PDPs Vice Presidential Ticket (Photos)
item.description: The Governor of Rivers State, Nyesom Wike on Saturday made his first public appearance after losing the Vice Presidential ticket of the Peoples Democratic Party. Recall that Wike lost the chance to be Atiku Abubakar’s running mate to the Governor of Delta State, Ifeanyi Okowa. Wike who was dressed in a white kaftan was accompanied by his wife, Justice Eberechi Suzette Nyesom-Wike, to the wedding ceremony of Chima Emmanuel Aguma. The ceremony was attended by many dignitaries on Saturday.

item.title: 'Nigerians Are Hypocrites' - Toyin Lawani Reacts To Nun Outfit Criticism
item.description: Fashion stylist and influencer, Toyin Lawani, has reacted to criticism that followed her raunchy nun outfit on Sunday. The fashionista sparked outrage over her controversial dress for the premiere of ‘Prophetess‘, a movie by Niyi Akinmolayan. In several photos shared on her Instagram page, Lawani could be seen clad in an all-white attire with a sign of the cross inscribed on it. Although she was partly unclad as her thighs could be visibly seen while she also accompanied the photos with religious-inclined captions.

item.title: FG To Begin Demarcation Of Niger, Kaduna, Kogi, Nasarawa, FCT Boundaries
item.description: To forestall conflict in the future, the Federal Government said it is necessary to now begin the demarcation of the boundaries between the Federal Capital Territory and four neighbouring States. Naija News reports that the government disclosed its intention on Tuesday in a statement by the Director-General, National Boundary Commission (NBC), Mr Adamu Adaji. Adaji while addressing a press conference in Abuja yesterday, noted that the intended demarcation is not aimed at creating barriers or made to cause division of families and properties, ‘it is just for administrative convenience,” he said.

item.title: Adekunle Gold Tackles OAU After Colleagues' Attack At LASU
item.description: Nigerian Afro-pop singer, Adekunle Gold on Friday tackled Obafemi Awolowo University (OAU), Ile Ife Osun State on social media. This comes while the singer was reacting to an invitation by the school on Twitter for artists to organise their shows at the university. The university wrote: “Bring your Concerts to OAU, we love fun here. Just dobale, singer nice songs and it’s a party mate. #OAUTwitter.” The invitation came after a rowdy session at a show organized by Poco Lee at Lagos State University (LASU).

He has also appeared on the Adam Carolla Show and Dancing With the Stars. In 2013 he starred in Tyler Perry Presents Peeples. After graduating he was a nominated for a Tony in the category for Best Feature Actor for his work in the 1981 musical The First, where he played Jackie Robinson.

item.title: Manchester City Beat Sevilla Via Penalties To Win First UEFA Super Cup
item.description: Manchester City defeated Spanish La Liga club, Sevilla, to win the 2023 UEFA Super Cup for the first time in the club’s history. Manchester City came from a goal down to draw with Sevilla and pushed the game into a penalty shootout at the Georgios Karaiskakis stadium in Piraeus, Greece earlier today, August 16. The reigning Europa League winners, Sevilla who didn’t see much of the ball managed to take the lead in the 25th minute courtesy of a strike from Youssef En-Nesyri which was assisted by Argentine left-back Marcos Acuña.

item.title: Wakazi wa Nyandarua wawazika watu 9 baada ya kutoka kwa mazishi nyingine
item.description: -Watu 9 wa kijiji kimoja waliofariki katika ajali ya barabarani kwenye barabara ya Nyeri – Nyandarua wamezikwa kijijini Kiboya, kaunti ya Nyandarua -Tisa hao walizikwa Jumanne, Januari 16 baada ya jamaa zao kutoka kwa mazishi nyingine -Gharama za mazishi, ikiwemo kununua sanduku zilifanikishwa na serikali ya kaunti ya Nyandarua -Serikali hiyo ya kaunti iliahidi kulipa gharama za matibabu kwa walionusurika kifo kwenye ajali hiyo Watu tisa waliofariki katika ajali mbaya ya barabarani kwenye barabara ya Nyeri kuelekea Nyandarua wamezikwa Jumanne, Januari 16.

item.title: APC Fixes New Dates For Presidential Primary, Others
item.description: The ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) has shifted its presidential and other primary elections. The development was disclosed in a statement released by the National Publicity Secretary of the party, Felix Morka. The statement was titled, ‘APC adjusts schedule of activities for 2023 primary elections’. According to Morka, the National Working Committee of the party approved the new dates on Wednesday. Morka noted the presidential primary of the ruling party will be held on May 29, 2022.

item.title: FG Opens NEXIT Portal For Npower Batch A And B Beneficiaries (See How To Register)
item.description: The federal government has started sending mail notifications to batch A and B beneficiaries of the Npower scheme to enable them to access the NEXIT portal. This was disclosed on Monday by Nneka Ikem, Special Assistant, Media & Publicity to the Hon Minister of Humanitarian Affairs, Disaster Management, and Social Development, Hajiya Sadiya Farouq. Her statement also assured those who may be finding it difficult to access the portal to exercise patience and try again as there is heavy traffic of people trying to login.

Students Return To School In Kogi As Government Declares Date For Schools Reopening
item.description: The Kogi State government has ordered primary, secondary and tertiary institutions in the state to reopen as from September 14, 2020. The development was made public on Tuesday by the State’s Commissioner for Education, Science, and Technology, Hon. Wemi Jones during a press briefing in Lokoja, the State capital. Jones explained that the decision to reopen schools was taken after due consultation with all relevant stakeholders in the state and readiness to comply with COVID-19 health and safety protocols.

item.title: TikTok Piercing Roulette Challenge Players Let App Decide Where They'll Get Pierced
item.description: Tik Tok Users Are Supposedly Letting a Filter Decide Where to Pierce Their FacesBy Distractify StaffNov. 13 2019, Updated 4:28 p.m. ET One of several recent "challenges" to sweep TikTok is "piercing roulette," where users on the social media app use a piercing filter on Snapchat to randomly select a facial piercing placement. And then they supposedly get that same piercing on their actual face. Though it appears not a ton of people are flocking to tattoo and piercing salons because of the challenge, a few TikTok users have taken the dare seriously — in a few cases even piercing themselves, which is super not recommended.

item.title: 15 common misconceptions about Yoruba people
item.description: The Yoruba people are an ethnic group of southwestern and north central Nigeria. They are a collection of diverse people bound together by a common language, history, and culture. Reports have it that they make up 21% of Nigeria’s population, making them one of the largest ethnic groups in Africa. The Yorubas dominate the western part of the country. There are certain misconceptions about this group of people. You hear things like Yoruba people are fetish, dirty and all other negative things.

item.title: Pep Guardiola Reacts After Man City Escape Defeat In Japan
item.description: Pep Guardiola believes Manchester City still has a lot to improve upon after coming from behind to defeat Yokohama F Marinos 5-3 in Tokyo, Japan earlier today, July 23. Joao Cancelo made his comeback following a loan stint at Bayern Munich, Mateo Kovacic made his debut for City, and Kyle Walker served as the game’s captain. After the 2022-2023 season in which Manchester City won the Premier League, FA Cup, and Champions League titles, Guardiola’s team looked predictably rusty in their first preseason match.

item.title: Randy Waldrum Returns To Super Falcons Of Nigeria, Names 21 Players For Cameroon
item.description: Randy Waldrum announced his return to the Nigerian women’s team by announcing the squad he will use to execute the 2024 Olympic Games third qualifying round fixture against Cameroon. Recall that Waldrum returned to his home country, the United States of America, after the Super Falcons crashed out of the 2023 Women’s World Cup in the round of 16. He had to return to the US because he was out of contract and the NFF was not forthcoming with a new deal.

item.title: 'Stop All Foreign Trips And Deal With This Ugly Situation Facing Us'
item.description: The Labour Party (LP) presidential candidate in the 2023 election, Peter Obi, has called on President Bola Tinubu and his vice, Kashim Shettima, to address the current insecurity in the country with immediate effect. Naija News reports that in a statement via X on Tuesday, the former Governor of Anambra State expressed deep concern over what he described as a surge of violence spreading through the Federal Capital Territory (FCT).

item.title: 2023: Why APC, PDP, Cannot Do Without Crisis
item.description: The Director-General of the Progressive Governors’ Forum (PGF), Salihu Lukman, says major political parties in the country cannot escape being embroiled in crisis. He stated that most of the parties are dominated by wealthy politicians who aspire to contest elections for political offices and want to have their ways. In a statement on Sunday, the All Progressives Congress (APC) chieftain noted that these moneybags also finance the parties and direct their affairs, which leads to crisis and factionalization.

item.title: Githurai 45: Mabarobaro walimana mangumi hadharani kwa sababu ya mrembo
item.description: Sinema ya bwerere ilitokea kwenye ploti moja mtaani Githurai 45, Nairobi baada ya malofa wawili kutandikanawalipokutana kwa kipusa mmoja kila mmoja akidai alikuwa mpenziwe. Penyenye zinasema, mrembo alikuwa ameketi na jamaa mmoja wakipiga gumzo wakati mwingine aliwasili ghafla. Habari Nyingine: COVID-19: Wagonjwa 6 wafariki dunia, 283 waambukizwa virusi “Beib, nakupigia simu na hutaji kuipokea. Madharau ni ya nini?” jamaa aliwaka. Kulingana na Taifa leo, kipusa na jamaa waliyekuwa naye walibaki midomo wazi wasijue la kumjibu lofa.

item.title: Ohio | Famous Birthdays
item.description: The US state of Ohio is located in the Midwestern region. It is the 7th-most populous state with the largest metropolitan area being that of the Greater Cleveland area. The land was once the territory of the Iroquois people. The state's official mammal is the white-tailed deer. Ohio was the 17th state to join the Union. Trivia The state's motto is, "With God, all things are possible." The first man to walk on the moon, Neil Armstrong, was from Ohio.

item.title: Top Nigerian Newspaper Headlines For Today, Saturday, 22nd January, 2022
item.description: Good morning Nigeria, welcome to Naija News roundup of top newspaper headlines in Nigeria for today Saturday, 22nd January 2022. By pleading patience from Nigerians over the sky-high price of rice during the launch of the “sky-high” rice pyramids in Abuja on Tuesday, President Muhammadu Buhari and his speechwriters must have sensed that they were putting the cart before the horse with the photo-up and that Nigerians were not moved. Naija News expects that before this showboating, the commodity should have been made widely available and affordable.

item.title: Energy, Food Price Hike Looms In Nigeria, Others
item.description: The African Development Bank Group has alerted African nations including Nigeria of a looming hike in the price of food, and energy among others in the coming months. The multilateral development finance institution noted in a statement that the global food crisis was further triggered by the ongoing war in Europe between Russia and Ukraine. AfDB President, Dr Akinwumi Adesina, revealed this during the weekend while speaking as a guest at the Atlantic Council’s Africa Center, Naija News understands.

item.title: Experts Predict Fuel to Sell For N1,000 Per Litre by December as FG Says 56 Firms Now Have Import Li
item.description: The price of petrol may shoot to N1,000 by December due to a combination of factorsAnalysts have said the issues of high Forex and the cost of crude oil will increase petrol pricesOthers said that the price might moderate as more marketers enter the marketPAY ATTENTION:Follow our WhatsApp channel to never miss out on the news that matters to you! According to energy policy analysts, the combination of high Forex and lack of funds might drive the price of petrol to N1,000 per litre on or before December 2023.

item.title: Lexi Drew - Age, Family, Bio
PDP Issues Certificate Of Return To Ighodalo
item.description: The National Working Committee (NWC) of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has issued a Certificate of Return to the winner of the party’s governorship primary election in Edo State, Asue Ighodalo. The PDP Acting National Chairman, Umar Damagum, presented the certificate of return to Ighodalo on Tuesday at the party’s headquarters in Abuja. Naija News recalls that Ighodalo was declared the winner of the election held last Thursday, which was conducted by Governor Dauda Lawal of Zamfara State.

item.title: Seun Kuti biography: age, mother, educational background, wife
item.description: Seun Kuti is a famous Nigerian singer and one of the sons of the late musician Fela Kuti. He assumed leadership of his late father's band when he was 14 years. He never disappointed as he has helped build it to what it is today. So far in his illustrious career, the musician has achieved a lot. He has produced numerous top-selling Afrobeat songs. This biography will give you more information about the singer.

item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo Wins Multiple Awards At Globe Soccer Awards, See All Winners
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo who scored 54 goals in the last 12 months which is the same assessment period for the Globe Soccer Awards, scored 10 goals for Portugal and 44 goals for A Nassr throughout 2023. In recognition of his prolific form in the calendar year under review, the 38-year-old Portuguese football icon won the Best Middle East Player award, beating Riyad Mahrez and Mohamed El Shenawy to it. The five-time Ballon d’Or winner also won the Maradona Award for being the top scorer in 2023, ahead of Harry Kane and Kylian Mbappe who scored 52 goals each for club and country, and Erling Haaland who scored 53 goals in 2023.

item.title: Ethan Hawke - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Stars as Jesse in Richard Linklater's Before Sunrise series. In 2001, he received a Screen Actors Guild Award nomination for his portrayal of Jake Hoyt in Training Day and his role in the 2014 film Boyhood earned him an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor. Before Fame In his youth, he aspired to become a writer but developed a love for acting after starring in a school production of Saint Joan. Later in life, he would fulfill his wish and write novels.

item.title: European Court Rules In Favour Of European Super League
item.description: The European Court of Justice has given the go-ahead for the existence of the breakaway league, European Super League earlier today, December 21. The news that 12 teams, including Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool, Manchester City, Manchester United, and Tottenham, had signed up for the breakaway league marked the beginning of the ESL saga in April 2021. The proposals collapsed in less than 72 hours due to intense criticism and condemnation from supporters, other European leagues, and even the government.

item.title: Why Some PDP Governors Worked Against Jonathan In 2015
item.description: The former Governor of Niger State, Babagida Aliyu, has revealed why some Governors of the Peoples Democratic Party worked against former President Goodluck Jonathan’s second term bid. Aliyu while reacting to his suspension by the PDP in Chachanga Local Government Area of Niger, said some governors under the party worked against Jonathan in 2015 because he reneged on an agreement not to seek a second term. Recall that PDP in the LGA said Aliyu was suspended for anti-party activities, including working against Jonathan in 2015.

item.title: 'The Flash' Latest News and Updates
item.description: The superhero series The Flash is based on the DC Comics character Barry Allen (aka The Flash). The show, based in Central City, follows the superhero crime-fighter who gains superhuman speed after an explosion at S.T.A.R Labs. The Flash series begins with Barry Allen pursuing his mom's murderer, and goes on to introduce villains such as Zoom, Savitar, and Eva (Mirror Master).  The Flash is a spinoff of Arrow and part of the Arrowverse universe, which also includes Supergirl and Black Lightning.

item.title: Fuel Scarcity Hits Again - Legit.ng
item.description: Fuel scarcity in Nigeria has continued to bite harder as air passengers are stranded at the Lagos and Abuja international airports while motorists and users of the premium motor spirit across the country have had to contend with long queues at the few stations that occasionally sell the product. According to numerous reports, residents are also experiencing blackouts because they cannot buy petrol to run generators providing electricity to their homes due to the worsening public electricity supply across the country.

item.title: Gowon Urges Nigerians To Be Patient With Leaders

READ ALSO: How Mama HID Influenced Awolowo To Join Gowon's Govt Gowon noted that Nigeria being a country of diverse ethnic groups and various interests required time to fix.

item.title: Wikes Camp Gives New Condition For Peace
item.description: The camp of the Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike have given new condition for peace to reign in the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). The main opposition party has been battling with issues between its presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar and Wike. There have been steps to reconcile Atiku and Governor Wike ahead of the 2023 presidential election. A source in the camp of Wike who spoke with Vanguard on the crisis in the party said what they require is significant guarantees that will restore their confidence in the process of reconciliation.

item.title: Only PDP Has The Capability To Bring APC Down In Lagos, Southwest Okowa
item.description: Vice Presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Governor Ifeanyi Okowa has said that only the party has the capability to beat the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) in the upcoming election. The Delta state governor said this at the PDP Southeast zonal stakeholders’ meeting in Enugu on Tuesday. Okowa insisted that the PDP has what it takes to win the presidency in all the six geo-political zones. He argued that the party is getting stronger in the Northwest and Northeast.

item.title: Ekweremadu Jettisons Governorship Ambition, To Announce Next Move
item.description: A governorship aspirant on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Enugu State, Senator  Ike Ekweremadu has withdrawn from the race to occupy the State Government House. The former Deputy Senate President withdrew his participation from the PDP governorship primary in a statement by his Campaign Organisation issued on Wednesday. This comes a day after the former governor of Old Anambra State, Senator Jim Nwobodo, announced that Dr Peter Mbah has been adopted as the next governor of Enugu State.

item.title: This College Student Failed Her Friends' Impromptu Trivia Quiz on History
item.description: The internet feels awful for this college student who fails her friends' quiz on relatively simply history trivia. Let's break it down. Source: TikTok/@maddieeegggFor all intents and purposes, intelligence isn't always measured by how well you did in school or in college. A student's capacity for knowledge isn't always indicated by their grades in school or what university they're able to attend, just as their lack of knowledge in certain subjects doesn't mean they aren't proficient in other fields.

item.title: Peter Obi Speaks On Giving Kwankwaso N40bn To Step Down For Him
item.description: The 2023 presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP), Peter Obi has reacted to some reports claiming he gave the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP) candidate, Rabiu Kwankwaso the sum of N40bn to step down for him. Speaking on Monday in Lagos State during an interactive session with the Nigerian Guild of Editors, Obi said there is no truth in the report in some sections of the media that he gave 40bn to Kwankwaso to step down for him.

'Dodgeball Thunderdome' Host Erin Lim Is Engaged to Boyfriend Joshua Rhodes
item.description: Erin Lim is co-hosting 'Dodgeball Thunderdome' with the King of YouTube, David Dobrik — and she is newly engaged to her boyfriend Joshua Rhodes. Source: InstagramWhile Dodgeball Thunderdome certainly won't be Erin Lim's first foray into hosting, it may be her most unique gig yet. She's co-hosting the Discovery competition series with YouTube superstar David Dobrik, and it's already being hailed as the ideal combination of Wipeout and an elementary school gym class.

item.title: Amy Slaton Is Pregnant With Her Second Baby, Confirming Rumors Among '1000-Lb Sisters' Fans
item.description: Amy Slaton from '1000-lb Sisters' is pregnant with her second child. Now that she has confirmed it on social media, fans want to know — what is her due date? Source: InstagramThe rumor mill is strong in the world of reality TV. And when it comes to 1000-lb Sisters, fans often speculate on what will happen next with Tammy and Amy Slaton. So when some claimed Amy was pregnant again, other fans took the idea and ran with it.

item.title: Billy Ray Cyrus - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Country singer best known for his #1 single "Achy Breaky Heart" from his 1992 U.S. certified 9x multi-platinum debut album Some Gave All. He starred on the TV series Doc from 2001 to 2004 and on Disney's Hannah Montana alongside his daughter Miley from 2006 to 2011. Before Fame He began singing when he was four years old and later on received a baseball scholarship to Georgetown College before pursuing music as a career. He dropped out of college to play music with the band Sly Dog.

item.title: Boris Laursen - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Social media sensation who became best known for his comedic personality on Vine. His account brought him over 1.3 million followers. His success followed him to Instagram, where he has more than 850,000 followers. Before Fame He posted his first video to Vine on October 13, 2013, but didn't start posting consistently until December of that year. Trivia He posted a series of videos titled "I Just Stole a Kiss." One of those videos was labeled as a Grandpa Edition.

item.title: CBN To Take New Measures To Stabilize Naira
item.description: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has said it is set to take new measures to stabilize the naira against the dollar. The acting Governor of the CBN, Folashodun Shonubi, stated this in a chat with the State House correspondents on Monday after a meeting with President Bola Tinubu at the presidential villa, Abuja. Shonubi said the apex bank  is poised to reverse the slide of the naira as it has lined up intervention measures that will be unveiled in the next few days.

item.title: Chris Lopez Has Never Been a Fan of 'Teen Mom 2' or the Cameras
item.description: Despite having two babies with 'Teen Mom 2' star Kailyn Lowry, Chris Lopez isn't usually on the show, and fans want to know why he stays away from it. Source: InstagramWhen you date a reality TV star, you usually have to take all that comes with being part of that lifestyle. But when Chris Lopez started seeing Teen Mom 2 star Kailyn Lowry, he failed to embrace being on TV. He has appeared on the show, but he has also made his feelings clear about not being a permanent supporting cast member.

item.title: David Boreanaz - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known for his role as Angel on the television shows Buffy the Vampire Slayer and Angel. He began starring on SEAL Team in 2017. Before Fame He decided to become an actor at age 7 and was eventually discovered after walking his dog by his neighbor. Trivia He also became known as Special Agent Seeley Booth on the television crime drama Bones. Family Life He married Jaime Bergman in 2001, and the couple welcomed their son Jaden in 2002 and daughter Bella in 2009.

By Melissa WilletsNov. 8 2023, Updated 10:20 a.m. ET The Gist: Garth Brooks is the latest celebrity to wade into the Bud Light controversy.The country music legend will sell the beer in his new Nashville bar.He has spoken out against exclusion in light of Dylan Mulvaney's involvement with the brand.

item.title: Ghanaians Beg Yvonne Nelson And John Dumelo To Get Married
item.description: Ghanaians have recently pleaded with award winning actress and actor, Yvonne Nelson and John Dumelo to get married, considering their public shows of affection that has heralded their friendship relationship. The beautiful actress, Yvonne Nelson, has been urged to marry her long time friend and colleague, John Dumelo, instead of the frequent frolicking and uncalled rumors that has made their friendship to be more popular. House of Reps Demands Probe Of Raid On Justice Odilis Residence
item.description: The House of Representatives has condemned the invasion of the Abuja residence of a Supreme Court Judge, Justice Mary Odili, by security operatives. Naija News had reported that a joint team of security operatives invaded the judge’s home to execute a search warrant as part of investigations into her husband, Peter Odili, who is a former Governor of Rivers State. The security operatives, who were made up of soldiers and officers of the Nigeria Police Force (NPF), were identified as members of a Joint Task Force.

item.title: Igbo Group To Boko Haram: Well Revenge Any Attack On Igbo Soil
item.description: PAN Igbo socio-political organisation, Obigbo, has warned Boko Haram insurgents to regard the South East as a no go area, noting that any attack on Ndigbo on Igbo soil would be met with reprisal attacks. It also said that Ndigbo would not be part of any activity that will disintegrate Nigeria, adding that the Igbo would not watch while her people were killed in Igbo- land. The National Leader of the group, Chief Charles Ahize while briefing newsmen in Lagos urged all the governors of the south eastern states to tighten security in the region.

item.title: Is Dixie D'Amelio Performing at the Grammys? Here's What We Know
item.description: After rumors surfaced online, fans began questioning if Dixie D'Amelio is performing at The Grammys this year. So, is she actually taking the stage? During the tail end of 2020, one of the biggest rumors on social media was about the 2021 Grammys. Specifically, the claim that Dixie D'Amelio would be performing alongside Tekashi 6ix9ine.  Article continues below advertisement Despite mixed reactions by fans (and even some celebrities) online, is Dixie actually performing at the Grammys alongside Tekashi?

item.title: Kid Breaks Speed Record For Solving A Rubik's Cube, And Becomes Instant Celebrity
item.description: A kid broke a Guinness world record with his insanely quick 4.59 second solving of a Rubik's Cube. Source: youtube It's crazy how many oddball records people really work to break. Half the time it makes you wonder how the records even started in the first place, it feels like they're basically invented on the spot and Guinness is like, yep we can do that. Like the guy who ate 82 chicken nuggets in one sitting and became every late night drunks hero.

item.title: Miguel Cotto - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Became the first Puerto Rican boxer to win world titles in four different weight divisions. He was ranked as the world's third best light middleweight by The Ring magazine in 2017. Before Fame He competed in the 2000 Sydney Olympics as an amateur. Trivia He signed a multi-fight deal with Golden Boy Productions in 2017. Family Life He married Melissa Guzman in 2008; they have a daughter named Alondra and a son named Miguel III.

item.title: Ohakim Reveals Why He Dumped PDP For APC
item.description: Former Imo State Governor, Chief Ikedi Ohakim has explained his decision to defect to the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC). As earlier reported by Naija News, Ohakim has officially defected to the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC). The former Governor defected to the APC at Okohia, in Isiala Mbano Local Government Area of Imo State, and was welcomed by party officials. Speaking at the reception organized to welcome him to the party, Ohakim said his decision to join APC was based on consultations with his people and the need to fully support Governor Hope Uzodimma to move the state forward.

item.title: Polisi wateketeza nyumba ya mama aliyeshindwa kutoa hongo
item.description: Wakazi wa kijiji cha Sianikha katika wadi ya Bunyala Magharibi wameshangazwa na kisa kimoja ambapo maafisa wa polisi walichoma nyumba ya mama mmoja Imesemekana kuwa maafisa hao wawili kutoka kituo cha polisi cha Navakholo wamekuwa wakichukua hongo kutoka kwa mama mmoja anayetengeneza pombe aina ya changaa. Habari Nyingine: Picha ya muigizaji Njoro akiwa amevalia sura ya huzuni kufutia kifo cha Shirandula Mama huyo aliyetambulika kama Teresa Ekesa alisema yeye hupeana hongo kwa maafisa hao ili asikamatwe na aendeleze biashara yake.

item.title: Read Full Text Of Pastor Tunde Bakare's Presidential Declaration
item.description: Pastor Tunde Bakare on Monday officially declared his interest in contesting the 2023 presidential election on the platform of the All Progressives Congress (APC). Naija News reports that Bakare, who was a running mate to President Muhammadu Buhari in 2011, made the declaration at Shehu Musa Yar’Adua Centre, Abuja. Read full speech below: Distinguished citizens of our great nation, Nigeria: elder statesmen and stateswomen; political leaders from across geopolitical zones and party lines; policymakers and bureaucrats from the national and subnational levels of government; representatives of civil society; private sector stakeholders; the intelligentsia, opinion moulders and thought leaders from various institutions of knowledge; students and youth, the posterity of this great nation; Nigerians at home and in the diaspora joining us via various media platforms; friends of Nigeria across the African continent and the world; Ladies and Gentlemen of the Press: It is with great pleasure that I welcome you to this distinguished gathering.

item.title: Return Bride Price I Paid Your Family Yul Edochie Tells May
item.description: Popular Nigerian actor, Yul Edochie, has asked his estranged wife, May Edochie, to refund the bride price he paid her family. Yul’s demand comes a day after he accused May of undergoing breast enlargement surgery after the loss of their first son in 2023 without his consent. He wrote in a post on Instagram, “2023 stole your flesh and blood but you still had enough time to do breast enlargement surgery and tummy tuck without your husband’s consent.

item.title: Rykel Bennett - Age, Family, Bio
Teacher Peter Tabichi lands top job weeks after winning KSh 100 million global prize
item.description: - The tutor won the Global teacher world prize organised by Varkey Foundation Global Teacher - The 36-year-old science teacher has now been appointed to champion for the rights of children whose education is affected by conflicts in the world - Teacher Tabichi welcomed the appointment saying it was a good opportunity for him to transform more lives Kenya's Global teacher world prize winner, Peter Tabichi, has been appointed as the first Champion for Children in Conflicts and Crisis for Education Cannot Wait, the global fund for children facing crisis in education.

item.title: Teen Gets Stepfamily Evicted After Being Forced to Give Up Room to Pregnant Sister's Boyfriend
item.description: A teen wanted to know if she was in the wrong for getting her family evicted from their home after they tried making her sleep on the couch. Source: Reddit | @nomoreadvantageIt's no secret that dealing with family issues can have a severe impact on one's mental health, especially when it comes to children and young adults. Oftentimes, younger kids can feel pressured or even "bullied" into accepting treatment from older family members who use a hierarchical structure in order to benefit from unequal exchanges.
